subject: Important: CSPIT - A Course on Liberal Arts | Photography (HSUS102) Workshop | March 25-28, 2025
snippet: Dear Students, Good Morning! This email is with reference to your liberal arts course registration on E-Governance. You have enrolled yourself for the Photography (HSUS102) course. We are excited to
content:
Dear Students,


Good Morning!


This email is with reference to your liberal arts course registration on
*E-Governance. * You have enrolled yourself for the *Photography (HSUS102)*
 course.



We are excited to welcome you to the *Photography* course as part of a
course on *Liberal Arts*.

Please be informed that all the *Liberal Arts Courses (HSUS101-117)* will
be taught in the Workshop Mode. *The dates for the Workshop are March
25-28, 2025.*


*Please make a note of following:*

1.      The Course Workshop will be offered/conducted in a *Workshop Mode
from 9:10 am to 4:30 pm* from March 25 to 28, 2025 (All four days).

2.      It is a 2-credit course and compulsory to attend the workshop on
said dates without fail.

3.      *If a student fails to attend the workshop or complete the exam,
tasks, activities and assignments, he/she may fail in the course and get a
backlog.*

4.      Students are required to collect a Kit. It will be available at
Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management on Monday - March 24, 2025 (from
9:30 am to 4:00 pm) in different slots. Your Institute/Department faculty
members will guide you for the same.

5.      Students must bring the Kit daily and take care of the materials
and instruments given to them. In case, if something is lost, concerned
students will be required to manage it.

6.      100% Attendance is Compulsory.

7.      The detailed day-wise schedule and SoP will be shared soon. Students
need to report in Time (at least 10 minutes before the stipulated time).

8.      Students must perform the Practical or do the tasks as assigned to
them.

9.      As the external Resource Persons are invited, students are also
required to maintain discipline and decorum befitting the students of a
university and professional programs.

10.  It is required that every student carries their own Identity Card.

11.  During the Workshop, students‚Äô day-wise submissions will also be taken.

12.  *Internal Evaluation as well as External University Exam will be
carried out during these four days only.*

13.  Details of the Syllabus of the opted Course, evaluation scheme and
other instructions will be provided to the students in their kit as well as
via email.

14.  Strictly follow the instructions/guidance given by the Resource
Persons / Faculty Coordinators.


*In case of any queries or concerns, you may reply to this email or contact
me (Dr. Kaushik Trivedi) on  +91 92656 20055.*



With regards,


Dr. Kaushik Trivedi

Course Coordinator (Photography)

Liberal Arts - 2025

--

subject: Summer Internship with Wipro Dice ID and NSDC Certification
snippet: Dear Student of Charusat University, "INTERNSHIPS DON'T JUST ADD TO YOUR RESUME; THEY DEFINE YOUR FUTURE. GET AHEAD BEFORE THE WORLD LEAVES YOU BEHIND üåê" INTERNSHIP WITH NSDC
content:
*Dear Student of Charusat University,*

*"INTERNSHIPS DON‚ÄôT JUST ADD TO YOUR RESUME; THEY DEFINE YOUR FUTURE. GET
AHEAD BEFORE THE WORLD LEAVES YOU BEHIND üåê"*

*INTERNSHIP WITH NSDC CERTIFICATION!*
üëâ We are excited to announce that all students attending this exclusive
2-Month Summer Training + Internship Program will now receive an *NSDC
(National Skill Development Corporation)  and WIPRO DICE ID Certification* ‚Äì
a valuable credential that can be used for *placement and college purposes*.

üìå *Application Form:* https://forms.gle/DDjMnNEeBnEXV4pPA

*Referral ID:* DICE_25
üìå *Program Highlights*

‚úÖ *Month 1:* Advanced training through live interactive sessions with
industry experts.
‚úÖ *Month 2:* Hands-on internship with real-world projects and expert
mentorship.
‚úÖ *Continuous Support:* 24/7 mentorship, doubt-clearing sessions, and
career guidance.
üéì *Certifications & Credentials*

üèÜ *Certificate of Completion* accredited by *AICTE*.
üèÜ *Internship Certificate* verified by *Wipro DICE ID* & leading MNCs.
üèÜ *Letter of Recommendation* for outstanding performers, endorsed by
industry experts.
üèÜ *NSDC Certification* ‚Äì Students will now receive an *NSDC (National
Skill Development Corporation) Certification* upon completion, which can be
used for *placement and college purposes*.
üìà *Additional Benefits*

‚ú® *6-month access* to a personalized LMS portal.
‚ú® *Placement assistance* through a dedicated career community for 6 months.
‚ú® 24/7 mentorship and doubt-clearing support.
‚ú® *6 months of recorded sessions* with access to LMS software, including:

   - *Resume building assistance*
   - *Mock interviews* to help prepare for real-world opportunities
   - *Assessments* for the sessions and mock interviews

üìå Apply Now:  https://forms.gle/DDjMnNEeBnEXV4pPA

*Referral ID:* DICE_25

üö® *Reminder: **Students kindly fill out the application form and complete
your registration by EOD.*

üëâ *For students already enrolled, please disregard this message.*

Best regards,
*Training and Internship Cell*
*LaunchEd Global*

content:

Your tutorial (Practice Session for MSUD102) will commence on *March 18,
2025*. This session is part of *continuous evaluation*, and your attendance
is *mandatory*.

subject: Invitation to Participate in Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025
snippet: Dear Students, The CHARUSAT NSS Cell is pleased to invite you to participate in the Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament 2025, an incredible opportunity to express your vision for a developed India. This
content:
Dear Students,

The *CHARUSAT NSS Cell* is pleased to invite you to participate in the *Viksit
Bharat Youth Parliament 2025*, an incredible opportunity to express your
vision for a developed India. This initiative, supported by the *Ministry
of Youth Affairs & Sports, Govt. of India*, encourages youth engagement in
policy discussions and leadership development.
*Event Details:*

*District-Level Competition:* 17th March 2025
*Venue:* Sardar Patel University, Vallabh Vidyanagar

*Register Here:* https://mybharat.gov.in/ -> Viksit Bharat Youth Parliament
2025 <https://mybharat.gov.in/mega_events/viksit-bharat-youth-parliament>
(*Register as soon as possible!*)
*Deadline : 16th March 2025*
*Participation Guidelines:*

   - Open to students aged *18-25 years*.
   - Submit a *1-minute video* on the topic: *"What does Viksit Bharat mean
   to you?"*
   - Language options: *Gujarati, Hindi, or English*.
   - *Selected 150 participants* will compete at the District Level.
   - *Top 10* will advance to the State Level, and winners will qualify for
   the *National Level* competition.

For detailed guidelines and further information, please find the *attached
PDF*.

*We encourage all eligible students to take advantage of this opportunity
and make CHARUSAT proud! *

For any queries, feel free to contact the *CHARUSAT **NSS Cell*.
-- 
Thanks & Regards
--

--

subject: Workshop Organized for Courses on Liberal Art from March 25 to 28, 2025
snippet: Dear FYME Students, With the aspiration to be a World Class University, Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) has initiated various constructive actions for holistic development of
content:
Dear FYME Students,



With the aspiration to be a *World Class University*, Charotar University
of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) has initiated various constructive
actions for holistic development of students of the University.



*Courses on Liberal Arts* offered by *Department of Humanities and Social
Sciences* *(HSS)* under *Faculty of Humanities (FoH)* to all the students
of Second semester of all constituent institutes of CHARUSAT is one of them.



*With the kind cooperation and support of all the constituent institutes
and Departments of CHARUSAT*, courses on Liberal Arts have been taught to
the students in Workshop Mode, consistently for TEN fruitful years wherein
courses like ‚Äì *Painting, Photography, Sculpting, Pottery and Ceramic Art,
Media and Graphic Design, Art & Craft, Contemporary Dance *and *Dramatics* are
offered to students. Along with these courses, additional courses like *Music
(Vocal), Music (Instrumental- Tabla, Guitar, Harmonium, Flute, Indian
Classical Dance ‚Äì Kathak and Bharatnatyam *are to be offered to the
students from this academic year.



Anticipating the same support and cooperation, this Academic year (2024-25)
in Even Semester, the Courses on Liberal Arts are scheduled to be offered
in Workshop Mode from *March 25 to 28, 2025.* Workshop kits for the
students will be distributed on* March 24, 2025* (from 9:30 am to 4:00 pm)
in different slots (providing the slots later) at Indukaka Ipcowala
Institute of Management on Monday.


PLEASE CONTACT *VIKAS PANCHAL SIR (ME) (+91-8866286233)* IF YOU FACE ANY
QUERY DURING THE WORKSHOP.
---

Regards,



*Dr. Sagar Chokshi,*

Associate Professor,

content:
Dear Students,

It has been observed on Day 1 (today) of the B. Tech. Second Semester
Midterm exam, students are reporting late for examination.

You are instructed *to report to your exam place at 10:10 am sharp without
fail *for further examination.

The entry of the multiutility building will be closed at 10:20 am from
tomorrow onwards. Therefore, please enter the building on or before that

You are constantly observed on camera so don't make any kind of copies or

subject: The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles | Volume 10 - Issue 2
snippet: Welcome to Quill The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles Greetings from CHARUSAT! In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we are delighted to introduce Quill ‚Äî the official
content:
[Welcome to Quill]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/pj902x2k39ea7/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/cde86d8c0da7b957c934ecfd99c713dcf0d13606]


THE QUILL: CHARUSAT CHRONICLES

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we
are delighted to introduce QUILL ‚Äî the official newsletter of
CHARUSAT. True to its name, Quill embodies the spirit of creativity,
intellect, and expression that defines our vibrant community.

WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE QUILL?

 	* ACCOLADES: CHARUSAT'S EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Celebrating extraordinary
accomplishments of our students, faculty, and alumni.
 	* RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS: THE EDGE OF EXPLORATION ‚Äì Showcasing
groundbreaking discoveries.
 	* EMINENT SPEAKERS: UNVEILING NEW PERCEPTIONS ‚Äì Dive into engaging
conversations and transformative ideas.
 	* CAMPUS BUZZ: CELEBRATING CAMPUS LIFE ‚Äì Experience the energy and
excitement of campus life.
 	* FACULTY SPOTLIGHT: ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Highlighting the
brilliance of our faculty.
 	* STUDENT SPOTLIGHT: RISING STARS ‚Äì Inspiring stories of our
student community.

Quill is more than just a newsletter; it is a chronicle of our shared
vision, growth, and success. Join us in celebrating the milestones and
moments that make CHARUSAT a hub of inspiration and innovation.

[Quill Cover Page]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/pj902x2k39ea7/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/6a1d41c8c004b6b45507b44a8baa19329fc0135a]

Warm regards,

snippet: Notification settings 24ME-EE-CL Due tomorrow Week-3 1. Program to find the first number greater than 10 that is divisible by 3 using the break keyword. 2. Program to keep asking for input until the
content:
Notification settings  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/s&Email=24me083@charusat.edu.in>
24ME-EE-CL  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NzM3NDE4ODMwODEw&Email=24me083@charusat.edu.in>
Due tomorrow

Week-3
1. Program to find the first number greater than 10 that is divisible by 3  
using the break keyword.
2. Program to keep asking for input until the user enters "quit" using the  
break keyword.
3. Program to print numbers from 1 to 10, skipping 5 and 7 using the  
continue keyword.
4. Print prime numbers between 1 and 100

Instructions

    - Write your ID number, aim, actual code, and output in an ipynb file as  
discussed in the lab session.
    - To download an ipynb file in Google Colab, go to the file menu and  
download the ipynb file.
    - file name must be your ID number.
    - Feel free to contact me for any queries.
    - For every program, the first line will be the print function, which  
will print your ID number.

Due Mar 8

subject: Hands on Workshop on HIgh Performance Computing under Super Computing Facility @ CHARUSAT
snippet: Hands-On Workshop on High Performance Computing Organized by Supercomputing Facility at CHARUSAT & AIML Club at CHARUSAT Dear Students and Faculty members, We are excited to invite you to a two-day
content:
Hands-On Workshop on High Performance Computing

Organized by Supercomputing Facility at CHARUSAT & AIML Club at CHARUSAT

Dear Students and Faculty members,

We are excited to invite you to a two-day hands-on workshop on High
Performance Computing (HPC) at CHARUSAT. This workshop will provide you
with practical experience in parallel computing techniques and technologies.
*Workshop Details:*

üìÖ Date: 11-12 March 2025

üìç Venue: 323A, A6 Building

üë• Maximum participants: 40

üí∞ Registration: Free of cost

*Note:* E-certificates will be provided to participants with 100%
attendance and 100% allocated task submission.
About the Workshop

This workshop will introduce you to the Supercomputing Facility at
CSPIT-CHARUSAT. You'll gain hands-on experience with various parallel
computing paradigms including:

   - ‚Ä¢ GPU Programming with CUDA
   - ‚Ä¢ Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP
   - ‚Ä¢ Distributed Memory Parallelism with MPI
   - ‚Ä¢ Multi-GPU training with PyTorch

Workshop Schedule
Time Day 1 (March 11) Day 2 (March 12)
9:10 AM - 10:00 AM Super computing in action - Transforming Science and
Innovation
Dr. Amit Thakkar
10:00 AM - 12:00 PM Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP
Dr. Ritesh Patel GPU Programming with CUDA (continued)
Dr. Ritesh Patel
12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Lunch Break Lunch Break
1:00 PM - 2:00 PM Shared Memory Parallelism with OpenMP (continued)
Dr. Ritesh Patel Multi-GPU training with PyTorch
Mr. Harshal Yagnik
2:00 PM - 4:20 PM Distributed Memory Parallelism with MPI
Mr. Harshal Yagnik Multi-GPU training with PyTorch (continued)
Mr. Harshal Yagnik
Benefits

   - ‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with the Supercomputing Facility
   - ‚Ä¢ Learn from experts in the field of high-performance computing
   - ‚Ä¢ E-certificates for participants with 100% attendance and task
   completion
   - ‚Ä¢ Valuable skills for research and industry applications

Registration Information

The workshop is open to all students and faculty members. Registration is
required as seats are limited to 40 participants.

Limited seats available - Register today!
Register Now <#>

Registration closes on March 9, 2025 or when all seats are filled

Organized by Supercomputing Facility at CHARUSAT & AIML Club |
CSPIT-CHARUSAT

"EMPOWERING THE POTENTIAL OF PARALLEL COMPUTING"


With Regards,

Amit Thakkar, Ph.D.
Professor & Head
Department of Computer Science & Engineering
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT)
Charotar University of Science & Technology.(CHARUSAT)
Jay Swaminarayan.

subject: Fwd: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in Engineering (WIE)
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, 7 Mar 2025, 9:36 am Subject: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal CSPIT <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, 7 Mar 2025, 9:36‚ÄØam
Subject: Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch - Women in
Engineering (WIE)
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>



Inauguration of IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Women in Engineering Affinity
Group and Seminar talk on "Women Innovators in Tech: Success Stories and
Lessons Learned"

Newly Established IEEE CHARUSAT Student Branch Women in Engineering
Affinity Group invites all female students and faculties of CHARUSAT to
participate in the inauguration ceremony followed by a seminar talk.
About IEEE WIE

*Vision:* "To be globally recognized for its contributions in STEM fields.
Our goal is to facilitate the recruitment and retention of women in
technical disciplines globally. We envision a vibrant community of IEEE
women and men collectively using their diverse talents to innovate for the
benefit of humanity."

*Mission:* "To connect, support, and inspire women and girls worldwide, and
facilitate their recruitment and retention in STEM fields, fostering
technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humanity."
Guest Speaker
Ruzan Khambatta

A visionary entrepreneur, social innovator, and passionate advocate for
women's empowerment. Through her groundbreaking initiatives like Wajra O'
Force, PoliceHEART 1091, and Halla Bol, she has transformed thousands of
lives. Her success mantra? Small steps today lead to giant leaps tomorrow!

Learn more about Ruzan Khambatta <https://ruzankhambatta.com/wizzo1/>
Event Details

   - *Date:* *10th March 2025*
   - *Time:* *9:45 AM to 11:00 AM*
   - *Venue:* *2nd floor, Seminar hall, CSPIT EC-EE(A6 building), CHARUSAT*

This event is a milestone moment as we officially launch the Student
Chapter of WiE Society of IEEE, a dedicated community to uplift and support
women in technology. Whether you're a student, professional, or tech
enthusiast, this is an opportunity to connect, learn, and be part of a
movement that drives change.

E-Certificates will be provided to all the participants.

Let's come together to celebrate, empower, and innovate!
Register Here
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1YtXFaNHx3A12jsPhcPr6jRjZWwjOh48EskA9I3Ra9Mg/edit>

Looking forward to your presence!

Regards,

-- 
Dr. Trushit Upadhyaya
Professor & I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421
Petlad, Anand, Gujarat, India.
M: 7874840344
https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=Gzsxo-oAAAAJ&hl=en

--

subject: Due tomorrow: "Week-2 "
snippet: Notification settings 24ME-EE-CL Due tomorrow Week-2 Write a Python program to print 1 to 20 numbers using the for and while loop. Write a Python program to sum 1 to 20 numbers using a for and while
content:
Notification settings  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/s&Email=24me083@charusat.edu.in>
24ME-EE-CL  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NzM3NDE4ODMwODEw&Email=24me083@charusat.edu.in>
Due tomorrow

Week-2

    - Write a Python program to print 1 to 20 numbers using the for and  
while loop.
    - Write a Python program to sum 1 to 20 numbers using a for and while  
loop.
    - Write a Python program to find the factorial of 10 using for and while.
    - Print the multiplication table of a number (e.g., 5x1=5 to 5x10=50).
    - Use a while loop to calculate the sum of digits of a number.
    - Write a Python program to find the gretest number among the given five  
numbers.
    - Write a Python program to reverse the given number.

Instructions

    - Write your ID number, aim, actual code, and output in an ipynb file as  
discussed in the lab session.
    - To download an ipynb file in Google Colab, go to the file menu and  
download the ipynb file.
    - file name must be your ID number.
    - Feel free to contact me for any queries.
    - For every program, the first line will be the print function, which  
will print your ID number.

Due Mar 7
View assignment  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NzM3NDE4ODMwODEw/a/NzM4MTkzNTM4MTk5/submissions/by-status/and-sort-last-name/all&Email=24me083@charusat.edu.in>

Dear CSPIT & DEPSTAR Students,

Elocution Competition ‚Äì 2025* as part of the initiative by the State NSS
Department. We invite interested students to participate and showcase their
oratory skills.

*Time:* 12:15 PM (Updated) Onwards
*Venue: *RPCP Auditorium
*Levels:* University ‚Üí Zone ‚Üí State

subject: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) - World‚Äôs No. 1 Ethical Hacking Certification, now with the power of AI (March 2025)
snippet: Dear students, We are glad to inform you that "Charotar University of Science and Technology - CHARUSAT" is the official EC-Council Academia Partner since January 2020. We are immensely
content:
Dear students,

We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and
Technology - CHARUSAT"* is the official *EC-Council Academia Partner *since
January 2020. We are immensely pleased to welcome ‚ÄúCHARUSAT‚Äù *students* to
EC Council's newly launched *CEHv13* program. Certified Ethical
Hacker CEHv13
<https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/> will
teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and
methodologies hackers and information security professionals use to hack an
organization lawfully. *110+ students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT
with a subsidized academia kit price.*

*What‚Äôs new in CEHv13?*: *From the creators of Certified Ethical Hacker
(CEH) comes the latest and evolved version 13 with added AI capabilities.
Structured across 20 learning modules covering over 550 attack techniques,
CEH provides cybersecurity professionals with the core knowledge they need
to detect and defend against emerging threats.*

*You will get:*

   - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv13 for self-study (24 Months) -
   Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App
   <https://support.vitalsource.com/hc/en-us/articles/201344733-Bookshelf-Download-Options>

   - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:
   *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* <https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI>.
   - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate
for* passing
   the exam. Accreditations
   <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eccouncil.org%2faccreditations%2f&c=E,1,hLej6Kb3ZRL_QKhhm71kedMm89bbj8UclU3d50zuCt2frG_t19Fir_60SvUk16RJBGYXwVBLF11HLMhr7nDv8WGkPElWNiTm9zdZ_xfo&typo=1>
   - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to
   hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,
   Ubuntu, Android)
   - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.

*Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*


* - Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g., Nmap, hping3)- Vulnerability
assessment tools (e.g., OpenVAS, Nessus)- Penetration testing tools (e.g.,
Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)- Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g.,
Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer)- Social engineering tools (e.g.,
Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))- Password
cracking tools (e.g., John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)- Forensics tools (e.g.
FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)- Wireless hacking tools (e.g., Aircrack-ng,
Wifiphisher)- Encryption tools (e.g., CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)*
*Master AI to automate ethical hacking tasks and hack and defend against AI
systems.*

*‚Ä¢ ShellGPT* ‚Äì Automates various reconnaissance and penetration testing
tasks using AI-driven scripting.
*‚Ä¢ ChatGPT *‚Äì Helps generate code, automate tasks, and create scripts for
ethical hacking.
‚Ä¢ *FraudGPT* ‚Äì Simulates AI-assisted malicious activities to learn defense
strategies.
‚Ä¢ *WormGPT* ‚Äì An offensive AI tool used to simulate exploitations and
malware creation.
‚Ä¢ *DeepExploit* ‚Äì AI-powered vulnerability scanning and exploitation tool.
‚Ä¢ *Nebula* ‚Äì Automates network discovery and vulnerability identification
with AI.
‚Ä¢ *Veed.io* ‚Äì Can visualize security analytics and post-exploitation
results for better reporting.


*Typical Job Roles for C|EH :*

   - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor
   - Cybersecurity Auditor
   - Security Administrator
   - IT Security Administrator
   - Cyber Defense Analyst
   - Senior Security Consultant
   - Information Security Manager
   - Senior SOC Analyst
   - Solution Architect
   - Cybersecurity Consultant



   - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst
   - Warning Analyst
   - Information Security Analyst 1
   - Security Analyst L1
   - Infosec Security Administrator
   - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3
   - Network Security Engineer
   - SOC Security Analyst
   - Security Analyst
   - Network Engineer

*Webinar on "A Career in Cybersecurity" by EC-Council with Collaboration of
CHARUSAT | Campus Official: *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-QgxO3JhlA


*Testimonials:*

   - How Certified Ethical Hacker Helped Me Land a Job with Big4 | Sidhant
   Gupta <https://youtu.be/PLvVyh96n8M?si=IVLEptb5F-QPMUaw>
   - Catch Your Big Break in Cybersecurity with C|EH | Ravina Joshi
   <https://youtu.be/TO7veOnV9T4?si=uzHTokSpVAtp1iOm>
   - How C|EH Helped Me Build a Successful Career in Cybersecurity
   <https://youtu.be/SZ8tmKzyBh4?si=TZpSsdfrCeZf2I2j>


*Cost for CHARUSAT Students only:*

   - *We* communicated and requested *the EC-Council for the same, and they
   are ready to provide a *subsidized academia kit* for CHARUSAT
   students at a *reduced cost as per the options below.

subject: Important Email: Clarification on Syllabus and Reading Material
snippet: Dear Students, In my last email, I shared the syllabus, and some of you raised concerns about a mismatch in section numbering. To clarify, please refer to the following reading material for Unit 2 and
content:
Dear Students,

In my last email, I shared the syllabus, and some of you raised concerns
about a mismatch in section numbering. To clarify, please refer to the
following reading material for *Unit 2* and *Unit 5* to verify the
syllabus. Do not get confused.

   - *Unit 2:* Up to *Subsection 2.2* (*Complementary Functions and Their
   Examples*). Please check *Subsection 2.2* in this reading material.
   - *Unit 5:* Only *Section 5.3* (*Evaluation of Double Integrals and Its
   Examples*), *excluding Sections 5.1 and 5.2*.  Please check *Subsection
   5.3* in this reading material

If you still have any doubts, feel free to contact me.

Best regards,
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences *
*PDPIAS, CHARUSAT, Changa-388421*
*Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC*

*Mob. No: **+91-9427777856  *

subject: Invitation to Participate ‚Äì Gujarat Cultural Elocution Competition 2025 (University, Zone, and State Level)
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family, We are pleased to inform you that the Gujarat Cultural Elocution Competition ‚Äì 2025 is being organized by the State NSS Department at University, Zone, and State Levels. As part
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT Family*,

We are pleased to inform you that the *Gujarat Cultural Elocution
Competition ‚Äì 2025* is being organized by the *State NSS Department*
at *University,
Zone, and State Levels*. As part of this initiative, the *CHARUSAT NSS Unit*
will be hosting the *University Level Competition*, and we invite
enthusiastic students to participate and showcase their oratory skills.
*Competition Details:*

üìÖ *Date:* 08/03/2025   ||   *Time :* 10:00 AM Onwards
üìç *Venue:* To Be Communicated Soon
üé§ *Levels:* University ‚Üí Zone ‚Üí State
*Topics (Choose One):*

‚úÖ Character Building for Nation Building
‚úÖ Importance of Constitution in a Citizen‚Äôs Life
‚úÖ Youth: The Future of the Nation ‚Äì Challenges and Responsibilities
‚úÖ Values, Morality, and Ethics: Pillars of Indian Culture
‚úÖ Developed India 2047: Vision for a Better Future

üîπ *Eligibility:* Participants must be born on or after *01/01/1999*.
üîπ *Winners will advance to the Zone and State Level Competitions.*

Interested students are requested to fill out the registration form by
clicking the link below:

üìå  https://forms.gle/LPeLhMmYZheqgaRr9 *(Dead Line : 06/03/2025 08:00 PM)

*üèÜ Prizes & Additional Details:*

For detailed information on *competition topics and prizes*, please refer
to the *attached PDFs*.


For any queries, feel free to contact:
üìû *Mr. Kishan Patel* ‚Äì Coordinator, NSS Cell-CHARUSAT (*+91 97244 42255*)
üìû *Mr. Dhruv Rupapara* ‚Äì Student Coordinator (*+91 63539 33976*)

We look forward to your enthusiastic participation!

üí™ *Best of luck to all participants! Be prepared with high practice and
give your best performance!*

*P.S.: All faculty members are requested to inform their respective
students about this competition.*
-- 
*Mr. Kishan Patel*
*Program Coordinator*
NSS Unit- CHARUSAT
Charotar University of Science and Technology

CHARUSAT Campus, CHANGA, Gujarat- 388421
Accredited with 'A+' by NAAC - Govt. of India

*"Not Me, But You"*

subject: Important Notice: Schedule Change & Mandatory Attendance on 9th March
snippet: Dear Students, We would like to inform you that a High-Level Committee of the Center of Excellence will be visiting our university on 9th March 2025. Due to this, there will be some changes in the
content:
Dear Students,

We would like to inform you that a High-Level Committee of the Center of
Excellence will be visiting our university on *9th March 2025*.

Due to this, there will be some changes in the academic schedule:

   - *9th March 2025 (Sunday):* Regular classes will be conducted as per
   the *Thursday* timetable. *Attendance on this day is compulsory.*
   - *13th March 2025 (Thursday):* The college will remain *closed* for the
   day.

All students are required to be present on *9th March* without fail. Please
take note of these changes and plan accordingly.

-- 
with regards:

*Dr. Dattatraya G. Subhedar*
Associate Professor,
Department of Mechanical Engineering,
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology

*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC*

*Accredited with "Grade A" by KCG*

(O): 02697 265227
Fax: 02697 247100

Dear All,

*The Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Department at Charotar
University of Science and Technology is pleased to invite you to
participate in our upcoming Equal Opportunity Cell (EOC) Activity on the
theme "**AI for Social Good ‚Äì Solving Real-World Issues**"*
Date: 7th March 2025
Timing: 12:00 to 2:00 pm
Registration Link: https://forms.gle/4dnzcafVqqNKr8cd9
Rules:

   -

   Students may present AI-based solutions for improving daily life,
   supporting disabled individuals, enhancing healthcare, or addressing social
   causes.
   -

   Students may submit their ideas in a group of up to 3 members.
   -

   Poster Presentation size: A2 *(presentation format is attached
   herewith.)*
   -

   The poster presentation must be in hard copy.

*Exciting Prizes:*

*1st Prize: ‚Çπ1500/-*

*2nd Prize: ‚Çπ1000/-*
*3rd Prize: ‚Çπ500/-*

   - All participants will receive an e-Certificate of Participation.

We request your kind cooperation and adherence to the above rules to ensure
the smooth conduct of the event.



-


*Thanks and Regards,*


*Gaurang A. Patel*

*Assistant Professor*

Department of Mechanical Engineering

Functional Dept: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning

Charotar University of Science & Technology

subject: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: Dear All, We're excited to announce the upcoming UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University on February 28th ‚Äì a must-attend event for students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú® Here's
content:
>
> Dear All,
>
> We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
>  at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
> students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®
>
> *Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*
>
>    1.
>
>    *On-the-Spot Counseling*
>    Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
>    study abroad questions.
>    2.
>
>    *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
>    Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
>    step-by-step.
>    3.
>
>    *Exclusive Scholarships*
>    Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations
>    like the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
>    4.
>
>    *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
>    After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile
>    for more personalized advice.
>
> This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
> clarity about your educational journey.
>
> *üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
> Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
> international education.
>
> *To register, click the link below*:
> *Register Now* <https://arisoverseas.com/uniexplore/>
> *Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*
> *Time: 10.00 A.M to 03.00 P.M*
> *Date: 28 FEB 2025*
>
> We look forward to seeing you there and helping you take the next big step
> in students academic journey!
>

snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content creation, social media
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

Arthyantra, the Economics Club of CHARUSAT, is now accepting applications
for new team members. This is an opportunity to gain experience in content
creation, social media management, finance, research, and event
coordination while contributing to the club‚Äôs initiatives.

subject: Don‚Äôt Miss Out: Join Us for the UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University! üåç
snippet: Dear All, We're excited to announce the upcoming UniExplore 2.0 International Fair at Charusat University on February 28th ‚Äì a must-attend event for students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú® Here's
content:
Dear All,

We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
 at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®

*Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*

   1.

   *On-the-Spot Counseling*
   Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
   study abroad questions.
   2.

   *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*
   Get a clear understanding of the documentation and loan process
   step-by-step.
   3.

   *Exclusive Scholarships*
   Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations like
   the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
   4.

   *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
   After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile for
   more personalized advice.

This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
clarity about your educational journey.

*üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
international education.

*To register, click the link below*:
*Register Now* <https://arisoverseas.com/uniexplore/>
*Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*
*Time: 10.00 A.M to 03.00 P.M*
*Date: 28 FEB 2025*

We look forward to seeing you there and helping you take the next big step
in students academic journey!

*Thanks & Regards,**Career Development and Placement Cell (CDPC)*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT) *
AT: Changa, Ta:Petlad, Dist:Anand, Gujarat
(T) 02697-265213

subject: Syllabus for 1st internal of BCME (MEUC102) on 12/03/2025
snippet: Dear Students, Please find the syllabus for 1st Internal (sessional) exam for BCME 1. Introduction of Mechanical Engineering 06 Hours 13% 1.1 Prime movers and its types, sources of energy 1.2 Basic
content:
Dear Students,

Please find the syllabus for 1st Internal (sessional) exam for BCME

*1.*

*Introduction of Mechanical Engineering*

*06 Hours*

*13%*

1.1

Prime movers and its types, sources of energy

1.2

Basic terminology: force and mass, pressure, work, power, energy, heat,
temperature, units of heat, specific heat capacity, interchange of heat,
change of state, internal energy, enthalpy, entropy, efficiency

1.3

Zeroth law and first law of thermodynamics, Boyle‚Äôs law, Charle‚Äôs law and
combined gas law, Relation between Cp and Cv

1.4

Constant volume process, constant pressure process, isothermal process,
poly-tropic process, adiabatic process

1.5

Numerical practice


*2.*




*Steam and Steam Generator*

2.1

Introduction to steam formation and its types

2.2

Introduction to steam table

2.4

Boiler definition and its classification

2.5

Cochran boiler, Babcock and Wilcox boiler and its mountings and
accessories *(Lab
Exp. 1 & 2)*

2.6

Efficiencies of boiler

*7.                  Scope of Civil Engineering*
7.1               Scope of Civil engineering
7.2               Branches of civil engineering,
7.3                Role of civil engineer

*8.                 Introduction to Surveying*
8.1               Definition of surveying
8.2              Objects of surveying, uses of surveying
8.3              Primary divisions of surveying, principles of surveying
-- 

Best Regards,



Dr. Abhishek Swarnkar (M.Tech.| PhD)

Assistant Professor

Charotar University of Science & Technology

+91 90992 23998 | abhishekswarnkar.me@charusat.ac.in

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear Student of ‚Äé‚ÄéCHARUSAT University, This is an exclusive opportunity to elevate your skills and jumpstart your career with the LaunchED 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of  ‚Äé‚Äé*CHARUSAT University*,

This is an exclusive opportunity to elevate your skills and jumpstart your
career with the LaunchED 2-Month Training + Internship Program, in
collaboration with Wipro Dice ID AICTE Certification.
üöÄ  *Application Deadline: 12:00 PM [23-02-2025]*
------------------------------

*üìã Application Form : *  https://forms.gle/dGvdjim8GEmwHrSD8
*‚úÖReferral ID:*‚Äé*CHARUSAT**_DICE ID  (FOR*‚Äé *CHARUSAT* *STUDENTS ONLY)*
------------------------------

*What You‚Äôll Gain:*

   1.

   *Comprehensive Training & Mentorship*
   - *Month 1*: Interactive, live sessions with industry leaders through
      your personalized learning portal.
      - *Month 2*: Real-world internship projects, providing you with the
      guidance of industry experts.
   2.

   *Industry-Recognized Certifications*
   - *Course Completion Certificate* from Lanched Global .
      - *Internship Certificate* from top MNCs, verified by Wipro DICE ID.
   3.

   *Professional Skill Development*
   - Master cutting-edge technologies such as *Generative AI*, *Prompt
      Engineering*, and *Low/No-Code Applications*.
      - Attend exclusive guest lectures from leaders at *Microsoft* and
      *Meta*.
   4.

   *Exclusive Benefits*
   - *6-month access* to a comprehensive LMS portal with personalized
      learning options.
      - *Placement Assistance* through a dedicated growth community.
      - *24/7 personalized mentorship* and live doubt-clearing sessions to
      ensure you are on track.

This program is designed to provide you with an invaluable opportunity to
gain practical knowledge and industry credentials that will set you apart
in today‚Äôs competitive job market.
*Why You Should Apply Now:*

   - Gain unparalleled mentorship and guidance from top industry leaders.
   - Improve your employability with certifications that are globally
   recognized.
   - Access exclusive internship opportunities that can lead to exciting
   career prospects.

* Apply before the deadline to secure your place.*

For students who are already enrolled, please disregard this message.

Best regards,
*LaunchED Global*

subject: Seating Arrangement - B.Tech-II : Midterm Exam Starting from 10th March, 2025
snippet: Dear students, You are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the email attachment. You are required to uphold decorum in the examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any
content:
Dear students,
You are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the email
attachment. You are required to uphold decorum in the examination hall.
Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic devices are strictly
prohibited within the exam hall. Bags must be left outside, and it is
mandatory to wear an ID card. You have to take their seat in the exam hall
at least 15 minutes prior to the exam time. At 10:15 AM the entry gate will
be closed and after 10:20 AM no one will be allowed to enter the
examination hall.

The exam will take place in Exam Hall 201 (first floor) and 301 (second
floor) of Multi Utility Complex.

--
with regards:

*Dr. Dattatraya G. Subhedar*

From: CDPC CHARUSAT <cdpc@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Feb 20, 2025 at 2:31‚ÄØPM

Fair at Charusat University! üåç

Dear All,

We‚Äôre excited to announce the upcoming *UniExplore 2.0 International Fair*
 at *Charusat University* on *February 28th* ‚Äì a must-attend event for
students aspiring to study abroad! ‚ú®

*Here‚Äôs what you can look forward to:*

   1.

   Direct guidance from university representatives, answering all your
   study abroad questions.

   *Complete Guidance for Education Loans*

   step-by-step.
   3.

   *Exclusive Scholarships*
   Discover scholarship opportunities for studying in top destinations like
   the *USA, UK, Canada, NZ, Australia*, and *Germany*.
   4.

   *One-to-One Profile Evaluation*
   After pre-counseling, meet university reps tailored to your profile for
   more personalized advice.

This event is a your *gateway to transforming their future* and gaining
clarity about your educational journey.

*üìå Don‚Äôt miss out!*
Mark your calendars for *February 28th*, and take your first step toward
international education.

*Venue: Central Lawn, CHARUSAT*

in students academic journey!

subject: CHARUSAT | FoH | Story Narrating Competition
snippet: Foundation Day 2025 Story Narrating Competition 2025 Jointly organized by Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management [IIIM] & Faculty of Humanities [FoH] "Unleash Your Imagination, Let Your
content:
[Foundation Day 2025]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/20986db598676eb1ed549684c002d31f5728889c]


STORY NARRATING COMPETITION 2025

 Jointly organized by 

INDUKAKA IPCOWALA INSTITUTE OF MANAGEMENT [IIIM]
&
FACULTY OF HUMANITIES [FOH]

"Unleash Your Imagination, Let Your Story Shine!"

"Storytelling is an age-old art that captivates audiences, stimulates
imagination, and preserves cultural heritage. Join us in this exciting
event where stories come to life, imagination knows no bounds, and
voices create unforgettable experiences!" 

üåü ABOUT THE EVENT

STORY NARRATING COMPETITION 2025, organized under the theme
INDIAN KNOWLEDGE SYSTEM, is here to celebrate creativity, culture, and
storytelling!

üìÖ DATE & TIME: February 21, 2025 | 10:30 AM onwards 

üé≠ REGISTRATION DETAILS

 	* REGISTER BY: February 20, 2025
 	* STORY THEME: Folk Tales, Inspirational Stories, Mythological
Tales, or Fictional Narratives

Register Now
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/deffdbff2458022a5a6fc21a81761850f8a7161d]


üèÜ AWARDS & CERTIFICATIONS

 	* üèÖ WINNER & RUNNER-UP: Trophy
 	* üìú ALL PARTICIPANTS: Participation Certificate
 	* EVENT CONVENORS: Dr. Binit Patel | Dr. Bhaskar Pandya
 	* EVENT COORDINATOR: Dr. Kinjal Bhatia
 	* CONTACT INFORMATION: +91 9033395935
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/309b22b6c6cc4f64be972de0ba0d4daab6df6da8]

üì¢ GENERAL RULES

 	* The competition is open to all registered students. Participants
must confirm their registration before the event.
 	* The narration must be in English.
 	* Each participant will have a 3 to 5-minute time slot for their
narration. Exceeding the limit may result in a penalty.
 	* Minimal use of handheld props is allowed, but the focus should
remain on narration. Visual presentations are not permitted.
 	* The storytelling should be engaging, expressive, and creative.
Unique presentation styles are encouraged.
 	* Participants must narrate their stories from memory. Reading
directly from a script is not allowed.

üîπ JUDGING CRITERIA

 	* üìñ Content & Creativity
 	* üé§ Expression & Voice Modulation
 	* üíÉ Body Language & Presentation
 	* ‚è≥ Time Management
 	* üåü Overall Impact

üîπ ADDITIONAL GUILDELINES

 	* DRESS CODE: Participants should dress appropriately for their
narration. Costumes are optional but should not overpower the
storytelling.
 	* PUNCTUALITY: Participants must arrive at least 30 minutes before
their scheduled slot.

üé§ We can't wait to hear your stories! See you there! üé≠

-------------------------

With best Regards,
MR. KRUTEN PATEL
Executive Officer - Corporate Communications 

[CHARUSAT Full-Length Image]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ba137rl8rs736/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/f6dea1af5509f89cbfa55a07a0d02bbfea0b79ed]

Dear All,

We are delighted to inform you about ‚Äú*Youth* ‡™∏‡™Ç‡™µ‡™æ‡™¶‚Äù an event dedicated to
awakening young minds, organized by Maa Shakti Charitable Trust, Nadiad.
This is a wonderful opportunity for staff and students to gain insights,
engage with thought leaders, and be part of an enriching experience.

register yourself.

distribution among registered participants.

content:
*Answer of MCQ EG midterm & university exam paper *


2.Which of the following angle should be drawn using a set square and a
combination of both set squares?

*[01]*















*d)*

*All of these*



*3.*

The presented dimensioning system in the above figure is an example of
___________.

*[01]*







*b)*

*Unidirectional dimensioning*











*4.*

In first angle projection method, the ___________lies between ___________
and ___________.

*[01]*







*b)*

*object, projection plane, observer*











*5.*

The isometric view of the rhombus will become ___________.

*[01]*







*b)*

*parallelogram*











*6.*

The development of the lateral surface of the cylinder is a ___________.

*[01]*







*b)*

*Rectangle*

Radial-line method is used for the development of a cone. True or False?

*True*

plane is parallel to HP?



*a)*

*AS=TS*

Match the following:

Dimension lines

Extension or Projection lines

subject: Practical Viva/ Exam of CLUC102- Engineering Mechanics and CL143 Engineering Mechanics Regarding
snippet: From: Pinal Patel [mailto:pinalpatel.cv@charusat.ac.in] Sent: 12 February 2025 15:26 To: Head Civil CHARUSAT <hod.cv@charusat.ac.in>; Head Mechanical CHARUSAT <hod.me@charusat.ac.in>; Head
content:
*From:* Pinal Patel [mailto:pinalpatel.cv@charusat.ac.in]
*Sent:* 12 February 2025 15:26
*To:* Head Civil CHARUSAT <hod.cv@charusat.ac.in>; Head Mechanical CHARUSAT
<hod.me@charusat.ac.in>; Head Electrical CHARUSAT <hod.ee@charusat.ac.in>
*Subject:* Practical Viva/ Exam of CLUC102- Engineering Mechanics and CL143
Engineering Mechanics Regarding



Dear HODs,



Request you to please inform the following message to the backlog students
of your department.



-------





Dear all,

The Practical Viva/Exam for CLUC102 - Engineering Mechanics & CL143
Engineering Mechanics for the Civil, Mechanical, and Electrical
engineering Students is scheduled as follows:



Date: 18/2/2025

Time: 10:00am to 12:00 pm

Venue: Room no 528B, First Floor, Civil Building





*Please report at 9:30 AM in room 528B for the viva, which will begin
promptly at 10:00 AM. *


Note: You will not be allowed to take the practical exam if your lab manual
and tutorial files are not certified by your lab teacher. It is mandatory
to bring your lab manual, tutorial file, hall ticket, and ID card. Failure
to present any of these will result in an AB mark in the Practical Exam
/Viva.









Thanks and Regards,

-

*Pinal Patel*

*M.E. (Structural Engineering)*


*Assistant Professor,**M.S. Patel Department of civil engineering,*

*Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,*

*Charotar University of Science and Technology*

*Changa-388421,*

*Dist: Anand,*

*Gujarat*

*Ext No: 5090*




-- 
with regards:

*Dr. Dattatraya G. Subhedar*
Associate Professor,
Department of Mechanical Engineering,
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology

*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC*

*Accredited with "Grade A" by KCG*
Education Campus Changa -388421

subject: Fwd: Interactive and hands-on self-defense training session for female students and staff members of CHARUSAT, under EOC
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: mittal desai <mittaldesai.mca@charusat.ac.in> Date: Tue, Feb 11, 2025 at 10:17 AM Subject: Interactive and hands-on self-defense training session for
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: mittal desai <mittaldesai.mca@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Feb 11, 2025 at 10:17‚ÄØAM
Subject: Interactive and hands-on self-defense training session for female
students and staff members of CHARUSAT, under EOC
To: Mukesh Pal <mukeshpal.mba@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Neeraj Jain <
neerajjain.as@charusat.ac.in>, Asifiqbal Thakor <
asifiqbalthakor.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Binal Joshi <
binaljoshi.nur@charusat.ac.in>, Geeta Marmat <geetamarmat.mba@charusat.ac.in>,
Dattatraya Ganpatrao Subhedar <dattatraya.me@charusat.ac.in>, Dhaval Bhoi <
dhavalbhoi.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Harshad Khade <
harshadkhade.cips@charusat.ac.in>, Hardik Jayswal <
hardikjayswal.it@charusat.ac.in>, Ashwin Makwana <
ashwinmakwana.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Hemant Yadav <
hemantyadav.it@charusat.ac.in>, Gaurang Patel <
gaurangpatel.dcs@charusat.ac.in>, Janki Thakker <
jankithakker.bt@charusat.ac.in>, Jivanadhar Joshi <
jivanjoshi.ee@charusat.ac.in>, kanan gamit <kanangamit.ph@charusat.ac.in>,
Kanchal Dave <kanchaldave.cv@charusat.ac.in>, Neeta Chudasama <
neetachudasama.dce@charusat.ac.in>, Nilay Solanki <
nilaysolanki.ph@charusat.ac.in>, Poonam Thanki <
poonamthanki.ec@charusat.ac.in>, Rajendra Solanki <
rajendrasolanki.adm@charusat.ac.in>, Rajnik Katriya <
rajnikkatriya.it@charusat.ac.in>, srushti gajjar <
srushtigajjar.cse@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Kirti Makwana <
kirtimakwana.mba@charusat.ac.in>, Sumam Sunny <sumamsunny.phy@charusat.ac.in>,
Vipul Vyas <vipulvyas.cv@charusat.ac.in>, Head CE CHARUSAT <
hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Convener Equal Opportunity Cell CHARUSAT <convener.eoc@charusat.ac.in>


*Dear all,*

*In today‚Äôs world, personal safety and self-defense skills are essential
for everyone, especially for girls and women. *

*With rising concerns about safety and personal security, it is imperative
to equip young women with the skills and knowledge to protect themselves in
various situations.*

*CMPICA is organizing Interactive and hands-on self-defense training
session for female students and staff members of CHARUSAT, under EOC on 6th
March, 2025, 10:00AM to 12:00PM by **Sensei Chetan Fumakiya, Pratibha
Academy, Under the Project of Pratibha Self Defense Foundation.*

*All the interested female students and staff members are requested to
register using below link on or before 25/2/25:*
https://forms.gle/FHRA2WXU6t7zX2YZ6

*** The venue will be communicated soon.*

*****EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students to
participate and please forward this mail to students of your department.*

Dr. Mittal Desai,
Assistant Professor, MCA Department, CMPICA.
Officer on Special Duty - Charusat Innovation Venture Fund (CIVF)
CHARUSAT Campus,
At. & Post:- Changa, Tal: Petlad, Dist: Anand
Gujarat-388 421, India





-- 
with regards:

*Dr. Dattatraya G. Subhedar*
Associate Professor,
Department of Mechanical Engineering,
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology

*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC*

*Accredited with "Grade A" by KCG*
Education Campus Changa -388421
Dist: Anand, Gujarat India

Phone Contact:
Mobile: 09712624320
(O): 02697 265227
Fax: 02697 247100

content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that you must start writing your assignments
regularly. In this course, *MSUD102*, all communications will be
conducted *exclusively
via email*.

Additionally, mentioned *faculty members will check your assignment
submissions *, so please ensure timely and proper completion of your work.

Please check your emails regularly for updates, instructions, and any
important announcements related to the course.

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out.

subject: INFO_STUDENT
snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are excited to introduce a 2-Months Training + Internship Program in collaboration with IIT Kharagpur Kshitij, designed to boost your
content:
Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology,*

We are excited to introduce a 2-Months Training + Internship Program in
collaboration with *IIT Kharagpur Kshitij*, designed to boost your skills
and career prospects.

üîπ Training Overview

*Comprehensive Training & Mentorship*

   - Month 1: Live interactive sessions with industry experts.
   - Month 2: Hands-on internship projects with expert guidance.

*Industry-Recognized Certifications*

   - Certificate of Completion from IIT Kharagpur Kshitij.
   - Internship Certificate verified by Wipro DICE ID and top MNCs.

*Professional Skill Development*

   - Learn Generative AI, Prompt Engineering, and No-Code/Low-Code
   Applications.
   - Attend guest lectures from leaders at Microsoft & Meta.

*Exclusive Benefits*

   - 6-month access to a personalized LMS portal.
   - Placement Assistance through a dedicated career community.
   - 24/7 Mentorship & Doubt-Clearing to keep you on track.

Application Details




* - Application Form: https://forms.gle/7Egx785ngqPkMhXY9
<https://forms.gle/7Egx785ngqPkMhXY9>- Referral ID: CHST25 (For CHARUSAT
Students Only)- Application Deadline: 08:00 PM | 05th February 2025 *

*Note: *Today is the final day for registration, students registration
details will be sent to the Training and Placement Cell by EOD. So kindly
fill up the form before the deadline and complete your registration.



*For students already enrolled, please ignore this message.*

Best regards,
*Academic Head*
*LaunchEd Global | IIT Kharagpur Kshitij*

subject: "Internship_Career -UG Students of CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY "
snippet: Dear Student bearing Enrollment ID 24ME083 from CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY. Congratulations on being shortlisted for the internship program! [IMPORTANT] LaunchEd Global in Collaboration IIT KHARAGPUR (Kshitij
content:
*Dear Student bearing Enrollment ID 24ME083** from CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY*.
*Congratulations on being shortlisted for the internship program!*
*[IMPORTANT]*

*LaunchEd Global* in Collaboration   *IIT KHARAGPUR (Kshitij) is* Organizing
a *2-month training & internship program with certifications from WIPRO
Dice ID, IBM, CISCO, META, and AICTE-approved.  *Gain *industry-leading
skills* and *real-world experience* to advance your career!

*Fill out the Google Form today to reserve your place in the program:*

*https://forms.gle/VWhzEk9Fp23BKQmV9 <https://forms.gle/VWhzEk9Fp23BKQmV9>*

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information: *
*https://chat.whatsapp.com/HQlb0D2oAFl2Dfp4q9e3wR*
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/HQlb0D2oAFl2Dfp4q9e3wR>

*Here is an outline of the program's structure.*
*1. Training Outline*

   - *Live Mentoring with Industry Experts:* Evening classes (6:30 PM -
   8:00 PM) are conducted live on the Zoom platform to fit your schedule. Get
   guidance at every step.
- *From Basics to Advanced:* Perfect for beginners and those looking to
   refine advanced skills, starting from scratch.
- *AI-Powered Development Made Easy*: Build applications with minimal
   coding, create innovative solutions using Generative AI, and easily design
   effective AI prompts.
- *LMS Access for Flexibility: *Recorded live sessions will be uploaded to
   the Learning Management System (LMS) and available for 6 months from the
   batch start date. Login credentials will be shared after registration,
   ensuring uninterrupted learning at your own pace.

*2. Internship Conduct*

   - *10+ Minor Project**: *The minor project is an individual project,
   where students will work on projects related to each topic they are
   learning.
   - *Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and
   you will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
   assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with all the required
   data and materials for the project.
   - *Resume Building*: Get expert guidance to craft a standout resume that
   gets noticed.
   - *Mock Interviews*: Receive feedback from industry experts to sharpen
   your interview skills.
   - *Masterclasses*: Learn from top leaders in global companies through
   exclusive sessions.

*Certifications Provided*

   - *Course Certificate*: Receive a prestigious certificate from
   IIT-KHARAGPUR (Kshitij)
   - *Internship Certificate*: Earn a certificate from our partnered MNCs &
   StartUps.
   - *Verified by WIPRO Dice ID*: Both the Certificates will be verified by
   WIPRO Dice ID
   - *100% Placement Assistance: *Join Our Growth Community for Direct
   Placement Support with Top Companies.

subject: Opportunity to Join Blockchain Discussion on Bharat Blockchain Network
snippet: Dear Students, I hope you are doing well. We are excited to invite you to participate in an engaging Blockchain Discussion hosted on the Bharat Blockchain Network Discord Community. This is a great
content:
Dear Students,

I hope you are doing well.

We are excited to invite you to participate in an engaging *Blockchain
Discussion* hosted on the *Bharat Blockchain Network Discord Community*.
This is a great opportunity for blockchain enthusiasts to expand their
knowledge, interact with like-minded individuals, and showcase their
expertise.
*Discussion Details:*

   - *Format:* A structured discussion (not a formal debate) on a relevant
   blockchain topic.
   - *Topic:* Will be shared upon confirmation of participation.
   - *Preparation Time:* 3 days after topic announcement.
   - *Team Requirement:* 2 teams of at least 4 members each.
   - *Prizes:* Exciting rewards for outstanding contributions!

*Why Participate?*

   - Gain insights into the latest blockchain trends.
   - Engage in meaningful discussions with industry professionals.
   - Enhance your knowledge and critical thinking skills in blockchain
   technology.
   - A chance to win prizes for demonstrating exceptional understanding and
   ideas.

*How to Confirm Your Participation?*

To confirm your participation, please *reply to this email* with your team
details, including:

   - *Team Member Names*
   - *ID Numbers*
   - *Contact Numbers*

We look forward to your participation and an insightful discussion!

Best Regards,

*Shrey Lakhtaria**Dhairya Kanabar*
*Campus Ambassador, IDS/BBN*

-- 


Shrey Lakhtaria

Computer Science Engineering, CSPIT.

<https://github.com/shreylakhtaria>
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/shrey-lakhataria/>
<https://www.instagram.com/shrey7120/>

subject: Fwd: 3030 Eklavya Weekly Online Program- IIT Gandhinagar
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply9@aicte-india.org> Date: Thu, Jan 30, 2025 at 9:56 AM Subject: 3030 Eklavya Weekly Online Program- IIT Gandhinagar Respected
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply9@aicte-india.org>
Date: Thu, Jan 30, 2025 at 9:56‚ÄØAM
Subject: 3030 Eklavya Weekly Online Program- IIT Gandhinagar

Respected Madam/Sir,

We would like to inform you that 3030 EKLAVYA is a program for teachers,
students and parents.

The 1st episode, Computing with Soap:
https://www.youtube.com/live/A3-PpOYzXps?si=d7nybVbTAuWEA8AW received 75K
views, 10K assignment submission, 19 min avg watch time.

*Contains solving computational problems - optimum metro-rail network,
Fastest descent problem posed by Galileo, analysed by Newton, Fermat  -
Calculus of Variations, Numerical Methods, optimization and nature of the
universe, cell structures & divisions using bubbles.*

The link of the Next Episode: *History of Time & Clock (2 Feb, Sunday 4
PM): *https://www.youtube.com/live/S6RR7sYtLzE?si=XWq3W-z9EQSiwKfA

*Link for Registration:* https://eklavya.iitgandhinagar.ac.in/

We request you to please disseminate the link among your team and also
encourage your team of faculty, students to watch the innovative programme.

*Regards*

*Dr. Amit Dutta, *
*Director,*
*Policy & Academic Planning Bureau*
*All India Council for Technical Education,*
*Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj,**New Delhi- 110070, Ph : 011-29581117*

-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

subject: FINAL REMAINDER FOR CHARUSAT STUDENTS TO APPLY FOR INTERNSHIP PROGRAM
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHARUSAT Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with LAUNCHED KSHIJIT IIT KHARAGPUR : a 2-Month Training and Internship Program featuring
content:
*DEAR STUDENTS*


*OF*
*CHARUSAT Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with
LAUNCHED  KSHIJIT IIT KHARAGPUR : a *2-Month Training and Internship
Program* featuring certifications from prestigious leading multinational
organizations across various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
shortlisted you will receive a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/ZsNx4HhQH9v2QHkv7>


*Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after the Registration Process.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week after 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* in alliance with LAUNCHED   KSHIJIT IIT
   KHARAGPUR
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*

subject: Kanubhai and Kamlakshi Patel Scholarship for the Students for the Academic year (2024-25) Undergraduate Program of CSPIT
snippet: Dear Students, We would like to inform you all that CHARUSAT will offer a new Merit-cum-Means Scholarship namely ‚ÄúKanubhai and Kamlakshi Patel Scholarship'' for the undergraduate students of
content:
Dear Students,



We would like to inform you all that CHARUSAT will offer a new
Merit-cum-Means Scholarship namely ‚ÄúKanubhai and Kamlakshi Patel
Scholarship'' for the undergraduate students of  Faculty of Engineering and
Technology (B.Tech., CSPIT) for the academic year 2024-25.


Please find notice and application form for your ready reference.



 Eligibility Criteria to get Scholarship for the Academic Year 2024-25:



v  *The Scholarship is available for **Charotar Moti Sattavis Patidar Samaj
Student Only.*

v  The Students of whose results are more than 75 Percentile in 12th
Standard (for First Year Student) and 7.5 CGPA without Backlog (for 2nd, 3rd &
4th year student) whose yearly family income is not more than Rs. 6.5 lacs
will be eligible to apply

v  *The Scholarship will be awarded to :*



*Program*

*Scholarship Amount in Rs. (per year)*

*No. of Students who will get benefit every year*

*First Year*

*Second Year*

*Third Year*

*Fourth Year*

*CSPIT (B.Tech.)*

*35000*

*3*

*2*

*3*

*0*



v  To continue to be eligible for availing Scholarship, the Student has to
secure 7.50 CGPA or above at the end of every Year without a backlog.



v  In case, a student will not score a minimum 7.50 CGPA in a consecutive
Year, then a scholarship will be awarded to another eligible student.



v  Students receiving two or more scholarships (e.g. MYSY) and Students
admitted under Tuition Fees waiver Scheme (TFWS) are not eligible to apply.




*The filled forms for the scholarship submitted to : **Mr. Yatin Talati,
Building A6 , Room No.101, CSPIT  Admin Office.*


*Last* *Date of Submission of Form: 15.02.2025*



 **Note: No Form will be accepted after the last date. *

--
Thanks,
*Yatin Talati*

subject: Meeting with the failure students of MSUD101 CSPIT and DEPSTAR
snippet: Dear all I have attached the list of failed students of MSUD101 Engineering Mathematics I with this email. The listed students are informed to remain present at 11:20 AM on 03/02/2025 in Seminar hall
content:
Dear all
I have attached the list of failed students of MSUD101 Engineering
Mathematics I with this email. The listed students are informed to remain
present at 11:20 AM on 03/02/2025 in Seminar hall room no 301, 2nd floor,

subject: Invite for Inspirational Talk by Dr Gnanvatsal Swami on 3rd February
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Vadodara Innovation Council <info@vicindia.org> Date: Tue, Jan 28, 2025 at 10:09 AM Subject: Invite for Inspirational Talk by Dr Gnanvatsal Swami on
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: *Vadodara Innovation Council* <info@vicindia.org>
Date: Tue, Jan 28, 2025 at 10:09‚ÄØAM
Subject: Invite for Inspirational Talk by Dr Gnanvatsal Swami on 3rd
February
To:
Cc: HT Patel <htpatel@yuvalay.org>, VIC India <ashishbhav@gmail.com>



Dear Sir/Madam,



Greetings from Maker Fest Vadodara 2025 Team.

Yuvalay Charitable Trust and Vadodara Innovation Council (VIC) warmly
invite you to a thought-provoking and transformative session as part of the
pre-event for the *7th edition of Maker Fest Vadodara*.

*Event Details:*

   - *Topic:* Thinking Differently and Making the Difference
   (‡™Ö‡™®‡´ã‡™ñ‡™æ ‡™µ‡™ø‡™ö‡™æ‡™∞, ‡™Ö‡™®‡´ã‡™ñ‡´Å‡™Ç ‡™ú‡´Ä‡™µ‡™®)
   - *Speaker:* Dr Gnanvatsal Swami
   (Renowned Life Coach and Eminent Speaker, BAPS Swaminarayan Sanstha)
   - *Date:* Monday, 3rd February 2025
   - *Time:* 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM
   - *Venue:* Sir Sayaji Rao Nagar Gruh, Vadodara
   - *Registration:* www.makerfestvadodara.com

For over a decade, Yuvalay has been a pillar of youth development,
fostering creativity and empowering young minds through its initiatives. VIC,
founded in 2011 as the first city-based Innovation Council in India, has
been committed to enhancing the culture of innovation in Vadodara by
providing a platform for innovators from all walks of life. Together,
Yuvalay and VIC are dedicated to inspiring individuals and creating
opportunities for meaningful change.

*Why Attend?*
In a world driven by rapid change, thinking differently has become a
cornerstone. This session by Dr Gnanvatsal Swami will provide valuable
insights on ‚ÄúLife Enhancement‚Äù, and make a significant impact on personal
and professional lives.

We request you to join this enlightening event and take the first step
towards transformative thinking.

We look forward to your presence at this inspiring session.



Regards,

H T Patel

Yuvalay Charitable Trust

Ashish Bhavsar

Vadodara Innovation Council

www.makerfestvadodara.com





-- 
with regards:

*Dr. Dattatraya G. Subhedar*
Associate Professor,
Department of Mechanical Engineering,
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology

*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC*

*Accredited with "Grade A" by KCG*
Education Campus Changa -388421
Dist: Anand, Gujarat India

Phone Contact:
Mobile: 09712624320
(O): 02697 265227
Fax: 02697 247100

--

content:
Dear Students,

27/01/2025. *(The course list is also attached herewith)*

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQRfIO7X-GvUiGo3EmWdWSILJyqjeTNfY5WsuC48n6s--tDGYHizlsqjXNfO0qY7yZqONcSEoYBCTkN/pubhtml

who have enrolled may change their profile and provide the following
information.*

 There are some compulsory steps to follow. Please take care of the

*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

content:

REPUBLIC DAY¬†GREETINGS!!!

Respected¬†All,

On the occasion of the 76TH INDIAN REPUBLIC DAY, the CHARUSAT MEDIA
CREW has created a special video as a tribute to our beloved Indian
flag, the Tiranga.

its colors, and the values it represents. We are proud to share this
creative expression with you.

subject: Fwd: IMP: Concern Regarding Student Absences in CESD Workshop Mode Course ‚ÄìCUUV101
snippet: Dear CESD Students, Refer to the trailing mail. Regards, ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Head CREDP CHARUSAT <head.credp@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Jan 24, 2025 at 12:08 PM Subject:
content:
Dear CESD Students,

Refer to the trailing mail.

Regards,

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head CREDP CHARUSAT <head.credp@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Jan 24, 2025 at 12:08‚ÄØPM
Subject: Re: Concern Regarding Student Absences in CESD Workshop Mode
Course ‚ÄìCUUV101
To: Dean FTE CHARUSAT <dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>


Dear CESD Students,

Those who missed or did not attend the CESD Workshop in January 2025 must
register their confirmation using the link below latest by January 26,2025 .

üìã Registration Link:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1B4DFRsQIDlQOGl5kp3db6rYt20KsKrhGc4bheIzAE5U/edit?usp=sharing

üóìÔ∏è Last Opportunity: February 1, 2025 (Saturday)

üìç Venue: Kaloli and Ramol Village

‚è∞ Time: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 4:30 PM

Most Important: This is your final chance to earn 2 credits. Don‚Äôt miss out
on this golden opportunity!

Warm regards,



On Thu, 23 Jan, 2025, 17:53 Head CREDP CHARUSAT, <head.credp@charusat.ac.in>
wrote:

>
>
> Dear Sir;
>
> Greetings !
>
> I am writing to bring to your kind attention a significant concern
> regarding the *Community Engagement and Sustainable Development (CESD)*
> Workshop Mode Course that was organized from January 16th to 22nd, 2025,
> with an extension to January 23rd.
>
> Despite our efforts to communicate the importance of this workshop through
> several emails and reminders, we have noted that *45 students from CSPIT
> and 10 students from DEPSTAR* who opted for the CESD course *have not
> attended and have not communicated their absence*. This lack of
> participation is troubling, as it undermines the objectives of the CESD and
> the learning opportunities it provides. *( The list is attached herewith)*
>
> I believe it is crucial for us to understand the reasons behind this
> significant absence. A communication from your office may help emphasize
> the importance of this course and encourage these students to reach out
> regarding their situation.
>
> Thank you for your attention to this matter. I appreciate your support in
> addressing this issue and ensuring that our students are fully engaged in
> their educational opportunities.
>
> Warm regards;
>
> Dilip Gosai
>
> Course Coordinator
>
> CESD
>
> *Dr. Dilip Gosai*
> Head
> CREDP ( Charusat Rural Education Development Program)
> Charotar University of Science & Technology
> Accredited *Grade A+* by NAAC
>
> Charotar University of Science & Technology

> Web: www.charusat.ac.in
>
> <http://www.charusat.ac.in/>
>


-- 

Vijaykumar Chaudhary

Professor,

Faculty of Technology & Engineering

content:
[image: Google Forms]
.
Congratulation! You are selected for Wipro Industrial training and
Internship Program

After completing recruitment campaign from your college on 9th of January.

For this training & Internship program last day of registration is extended
to close on 20 January.

Kindly provide your confirmation by filling the form.

Referral code : CHARUSAT37
*Wipro accredited training and Internship program *
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf9bYs07bz07VmEqa1y4HuIabjqRmzGHAVzrST0F6pRqxwGRQ/viewform?vc=0&c=0&w=1&flr=0&usp=mail_form_link>


*Hello Dear Students,*

*Greetings from Navikshaa!*
     We are collaboration with Top MNCs Companies [*IBM ,MICROSOFT,
DELOITTE, EY, CISCO, COGNIZANT, BARCLAYS, INFOSYS, GENPACT, ORACLE, TCS,
PWC, J.P. MORGAN, AMAZON, ACCENTURE, HCL Technologies, Tech Mahindra, ETC]* And
organizing a* Training ,Internship And Placement Assistance program* on
multiple domains.
*  This is a 3-month completely online Training ,Internship And Placement *
*Assistance** Program with industrial experts Mentor with 10+ years of
experience!!*

*[ NOTE:- TRAINING FEES ARE APPLICABLE  ]*

  *1st Month [ Training/ Learning]*

   - *Theoretical learning from Basic to Advance with Industrial Experts.*
   -  Live interactive sessions.
   - *One to one Doubt clearing sessions*.
   - Weekly *Monday-Friday* sessions via Zoom App or Google Meet.
   - Weekly *Evaluation Tests*.

*2nd Month **[Internship/ Projects ]*

   -  Application of concepts learned in the first month.
   -  *Real-time /Hands-on Projects* with proper mentor assistance, to
   build an attractive resume.
   -  Industry Simulated Project - Group (30 days).

* 3rd Month ** [**Placement Assistance/ Pre-placement Preparation ]*

   - *Placement* *Assistance **[**Multiple sessions of Mock
   Interview, Group Discussion, Resume building, Enhancing the Communication
   Skills and Personality Development, Placement Assistance will be given to
   you, which will make you stand out in the placement procedure.]*

*Certificates :-*

   1. Wipro Certified Internship Completion Certificate.
   2. Course Completion Certificate from Navikshaa And ISO Certified .
   3. *Letter Of Recommendation [LOR] From MNCs for Job Reference.!*
   4. Excellent/Outstanding Certificate for Top Performer.!

Fill out in Google Forms

subject: Fwd: Open-up before the Opportunity Ends!! AIESEC in VVN Recs 25.1
snippet: Do you want to be in the TOP 1%? The AIESEC Influence! Huge companies recognize the AIESEC Experience. Monk Entertainment (Founded by Ranveer Allahbadia and Viraj Sheth) tweeted about AIESEC. DHL Group
content:
[image: image]



[image: image]



Do you want to be in the TOP 1%?



[image: image]
The AIESEC Influence!

Huge companies recognize the AIESEC Experience.

Monk Entertainment (Founded by Ranveer Allahbadia and Viraj Sheth) tweeted
about AIESEC.
[image: image]
DHL Group
and many more...

Become an AIESEC Vice President, and get eligible for a full-time
internship at DHL Group with a stipend of Rs.40,000/month.
[image: image]
Affiliated Universities

Get a fee waiver in top colleges affiliated with AIESEC, if you have AIESEC
Experience.


REGISTER HERE!
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1aBmnYrR-fc8HpzhP-uQL5b5SkxOQ6LOlxjtI9PLZIXg/viewform?fbclid=PAZXh0bgNhZW0CMTEAAabn-zcJJca8WIfuMSz3pwgOJRch2VeQdbLDD3WK_-TJishQWKhkYn2YFtU_aem_kXgAVlNeVB5il_z87jKZaw&edit_requested=true&pli=1>



[image: image]
Looking for Life Changing Experiences ?? Wanna boost your CV ??

Become an AIESEC Member!! Numerous LIFE-CHANGING EXPERIENCES and an LOE to
strengthen your resume!
Watch this Video
<https://www.instagram.com/p/BsaicuVl6HQ/?igsh=MXRkODJzemRpMmpoMA%3D%3D&img_index=1>



Here are your Interests!



[image: image]
Outgoing Exchanges

Help us get the Exchange Participant have the smoothest experience! Let's
foster Global Connections!
[image: image]
Marketing

Let's generate the finest leads! Learn more about marketing and improve
your public speaking skills!
[image: image]
Business Development

Let's generate the finest leads! Learn more about marketing and improve
your public speaking skills!


REGISTER HERE!
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1aBmnYrR-fc8HpzhP-uQL5b5SkxOQ6LOlxjtI9PLZIXg/viewform?fbclid=PAZXh0bgNhZW0CMTEAAabn-zcJJca8WIfuMSz3pwgOJRch2VeQdbLDD3WK_-TJishQWKhkYn2YFtU_aem_kXgAVlNeVB5il_z87jKZaw&edit_requested=true&pli=1>



[image: image]
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1u-74sc4IIs>



Why AIESEC?

AIESEC is more than an organisation‚Äîit's a global movement of young leaders
driving impactful change. Through leadership development and cross-cultural
exchanges, AIESEC empowers you to unlock your potential, gain life-changing
experiences, and make a difference in the world. Join us to lead, grow, and
shape a better future!


REGISTER HERE!
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1aBmnYrR-fc8HpzhP-uQL5b5SkxOQ6LOlxjtI9PLZIXg/viewform?fbclid=PAZXh0bgNhZW0CMTEAAabn-zcJJca8WIfuMSz3pwgOJRch2VeQdbLDD3WK_-TJishQWKhkYn2YFtU_aem_kXgAVlNeVB5il_z87jKZaw&edit_requested=true&pli=1>



[image: image]

DON‚ÄôT WAIT for opportunities‚ÄîCREATE them and LEAD today!

For doubts and queries contact:

Krisha Akbari

Core Committee President

Phone No: +91 7046359029
Email:  krishaakbari@aiesec.net

Nidhi Dixit

Chief HR Officer

Phone No: +91 8160686980
Email: nidhi.dixit04@aiesec.net

[image: Link] <https://www.aiesec.in>[image: Email]
<siddharth.patel3804@aiesec.net>[image: Link]
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1aBmnYrR-fc8HpzhP-uQL5b5SkxOQ6LOlxjtI9PLZIXg>

subject: Join India‚Äôs Biggest Study Abroad Expo ‚Äì Register Now!
snippet: Dear Students We are excited to invite you to India's Biggest Study Abroad Expo, an exclusive opportunity for aspiring international students to interact directly with university representatives
content:
Dear Students

We are excited to invite you to *India‚Äôs Biggest Study Abroad Expo*, an
exclusive opportunity for aspiring international students to interact
directly with university representatives from *Australia* and *Canada*.

*Event Details:*
üìÖ *Date:* Monday, 20th January
‚è∞ *Time:* 11:00 AM ‚Äì 4:00 PM
üìç *Venue:* Grand Mercure, Vadodara

*Why You Should Attend:*

   - *Direct Access to World-Class Institutions*: Meet representatives
from *130+
   universities* to explore your academic options and scholarships.
   - *Scholarship Opportunities*: Learn how 11,000+ students secured
   scholarships last year and how *you* could be next.
   - *On-the-Spot IELTS Booking*: Book your IELTS test and receive access
   to free preparation materials.
   - *Education Loan Assistance*: Get guidance on securing education loans
   up to ‚Çπ3 crore and save up to ‚Çπ1 lakh.

We understand you may have commitments to sports or cultural events, so we
kindly request that you register only if you can ensure your confirmed
participation.

*How to Register:*
Scan the QR code on the poster or click here
<https://forms.gle/8qRf6dHQNqLTBfe39> to secure your spot. Spaces are
limited, and registrations open till 4:00 PM today.)
[image: adobe-express-qr-code (7).png]

We look forward to helping you take the first step toward your global
education journey. Please feel free to reach out to us at +91 9998380041 if
you have any questions.

Warm regards,

*Kruten Patel*
*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*
