subject: Important Reminder for CESD Workshop Attendance
snippet: Reminder Email for CESD workshop presence Dear Students, Greetings from CESD Course fromCHARUSAT! This is a gentle reminder regarding your attendance in the Community Engagement and Sustainable
content:
*Reminder Email for CESD workshop presence*


Dear Students,

*Greetings from CESD Course fromCHARUSAT!*

This is a gentle reminder regarding your attendance in the *Community
Engagement and Sustainable Development (CESD) - CUUV101* course in Workshop
Mode, scheduled from *January 16th to 22nd, 2025*, from *9:00 AM to 4:30 PM*
daily.

It has come to our attention that some students did not attend the sessions
on *Day 1*. If you were absent, kindly ensure you attend the workshop
starting *tomorrow*, along with a *valid reason* for your absence today.
Your attendance and active participation are *mandatory*, as this is a
*two-credit
course* opted for during the academic year 2024-25. Please note that *no
post-workshop remedies will be provided*.

( *Those who have attended today please ignore for you* but encourage /
motivate your friends who have opted CESD to attend it to morrow onwards)

Here is a reminder of the key details:

*Workshop Schedule:*

*Morning Sessions:* 9:00 AM ‚Äì 12:00 PM

   - On-campus interactive discussions and activities.

*Lunch Break:* 12:00 PM ‚Äì 1:00 PM

*Afternoon Sessions:* 1:00 PM ‚Äì 4:30 PM

   - Field visits to Laval Village for hands-on community engagement
   activities.

*Key Information:*

   - *Dates:* January 16‚Äì22, 2025
   - *Time:* 9:00 AM ‚Äì 4:30 PM
   - *Morning Venue:* RPCP Auditorium, First Floor, Ramanbhai Patel College
   of Pharmacy
   - *Field Visit Location:* Laval Village, Ta- Matar, Dist-Kheda
   - *Transportation for Field Visits:* Arranged by CHARUSAT
      - Assemble at *Central Lawn, CHARUSAT campus* by *1:00 PM* daily to
      board the bus.

This workshop provides a unique opportunity to gain practical experience
and knowledge about community challenges and sustainable practices. Please
ensure your participation in both the *on-campus sessions* and the *field
visits* to successfully complete this program and earn your credits.

For any queries reach out to me at *9825293046*.

Looking forward to seeing you all tomorrow, without FAIL!


*Dr. Dilip Gosai*
Course Coordinator, CESD
*CHARUSAT*
*Dr. Dilip Gosai*
Head
CREDP ( Charusat Rural Education Development Program)
Charotar University of Science & Technology
Accredited *Grade A+* by NAAC

Charotar University of Science & Technology
CHARUSAT Campus - Changa
Off Nadiad-Petlad Highway,
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA
Ph +91-2697-265160 Cell No.+91-98252-93046
Web: www.charusat.ac.in

<http://www.charusat.ac.in/>

subject: Fwd: FW: Announcement: Certificate Course on "Training on Sophisticated Structural Models"
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Vijay Chaudhary <vijaychaudhary.me@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Jan 10, 2025 at 1:55 PM Subject: FW: Announcement: Certificate Course on "Training
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Vijay Chaudhary <vijaychaudhary.me@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Jan 10, 2025 at 1:55‚ÄØPM
Subject: FW: Announcement: Certificate Course on "Training on Sophisticated
Structural Models"
To: Mechanical <mech@charusat.ac.in>






*From:* Head Civil CHARUSAT [mailto:hod.cv@charusat.ac.in]
*Sent:* 10 January 2025 13:21
*To:* Dr. Vijay Chaudhary <vijaychaudhary.me@charusat.ac.in>
*Subject:* Fwd: Announcement: Certificate Course on "Training on
Sophisticated Structural Models"





---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: *Neha Chauhan* <nehachauhan.cv@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, 10 Jan 2025, 09:40
Subject: Announcement: Certificate Course on "Training on Sophisticated
Structural Models"
To: Civil <civil@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Head Civil CHARUSAT <hod.cv@charusat.ac.in>



Dear all,

We are excited to announce the upcoming *Certificate Course on "Training on
Sophisticated Structural Models"* organized by the M. S. Patel Department
of Civil Engineering, CSPIT, CHARUSAT.

This course offers practical insights into civil engineering by providing
hands-on experience with advanced structural models.

Through this program, you will:

   - *Understand Structural Behavior* under different loading conditions.
   - *Enhance Design Skills* for earthquake-resistant structures.
   - *Learn Practical Application* of structural dynamics using
   experimental setups.

*Key Details of the Course:*

   - *Duration:* January 17 to February 07, 2025 *(Course Duration :  30
   Hours )*
   - *Location:* CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, Gujarat
   - *Registration Fee (including GST):* ‚Çπ531
   - *Maximum Participants:* 25 (Seats are limited, so register early!)
   - *For Registration: *https://forms.gle/AWhJrEt1VtBVSub46

By the end of this course, you‚Äôll gain the essential skills to analyze and
design structures effectively, preparing you for future challenges in civil
and structural engineering.

*To Register:*
Kindly reach out to the Course Coordinators:

   - *Ms. Neha Rajput* at nehachauhan.cv@charusat.ac.in
   - *Ms. Pinal Patel* at pinalpatel.cv@charusat.ac.in

Don‚Äôt miss this opportunity to elevate your engineering expertise!

Please find the detailed brochure for the course attached for your
reference.



*P.S.* Nirpex Sir is kindly requested to share this announcement across all
Civil Engineering social platforms.

-- 

Thanks & Regards





*Ms Neha Hirensinh Rajput*

*Assistant Professor,*

*(Coordinator: Mtech (Structural Engineering)*

*Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,*

*Accredited Grade 'A' by NAAC & KCG*

*Changa, Anand , Gujarat- 388 421*

*Contact: (+91) 2697-265086 (Off)  **I** 9099027974(M)*

--

subject: Course Information and Evaluation Details for Engineering Mathematics-II (Course Code: MSUD102)
snippet: Dear Students, I hope you are doing well. I am Dr. Bina Patel, the subject coordinator for Engineering Mathematics-II (Course Code: MSUD102). I would like to share with you the course evaluation
content:
Dear Students,

I hope you are doing well. I am Dr. Bina Patel, the subject
coordinator for *Engineering
Mathematics-II (Course Code: MSUD102)*. I would like to share with you the
course evaluation structure and important dates.
*Course Evaluation Structure*

The total marks for the course are *100*, divided as follows:

   -

   *50 Marks ‚Äì Internal Examination*
   - *20 Marks* for mid-term exams
      - *10 Marks* for two online quizzes (*5 marks each*)
      - *10 Marks* for assignments
      - *10 Marks* for class tests
   -

   *50 Marks ‚Äì External Examination *

*Important Dates (Tentative)*

   1. *First Quiz:* 10th March 2025
   2. *Second Quiz:* 1st May 2025
   3. *Class Test:* Last week of April 2025

I am attaching the following materials to help you prepare for the course:

   - Reading materials for *Unit 1* and *Unit 4*
   - Assignment examples for  *Unit 1* and *Unit 4*
   - Practice examples   *Unit 1* and *Unit 4*

subject: LaunchED AVENUES IIT BOMBAY CERTIFICATIONS & Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits. It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought to you in partnership with IIT
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT  Students,*

I trust this message finds you in good health and spirits.

It is with great pleasure that we announce a remarkable opportunity brought
to you in partnership with *IIT Bombay's Avenues*: a *two-month Training
and Internship Program*. This distinguished program will grant certificates
from reputable multinational organizations in a variety of fields, further
enhancing your academic and professional credentials.



Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>


*Eligibility and Application:*

We extend an invitation to *shortlisted students* from all departments to
apply for this esteemed program. Should any of your fellow students not
have received this communication, we kindly ask that you forward it to them.

Those who wish to participate are required to submit their applications at
the earliest convenience. Should you be shortlisted, a member of our
esteemed HR team will reach out to you directly.

*Submit Your Application*
*Program Details:**Month 1: Training*

   - Participate in live, expert-led sessions and lectures.
   - Login details shall be provided subsequent to your registration.

*Month 2: Internship*

   - Embark upon a hands-on internship, where you shall work on live
   projects under the tutelage of seasoned professionals.
   - *Project Breakdown:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete ten distinct assignments under
      the guidance of your mentor.
      - *Capstone Group Project:* Collaborate with fellow interns on a
      capstone project, with each member assuming a specific role. All required
      resources shall be furnished by the organization.

*Learning Structure:*

   - *Blended Learning:* You will have access to recorded sessions and the
   opportunity to attend live sessions for doubt resolution every weekend.
   - *Live Mentor-Led Sessions:* Engage in live Zoom classes, held two to
   three times a week after 6:30 PM. These sessions will be recorded for
   future reference. Furthermore, you shall have access to our *Learning
   Management System (LMS)* for a period of six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon successful completion of the program, students will be awarded:

   - A *Certificate of Completion*, in association with *Avenues IIT Bombay*
   .
   - *Verified Certificates* via Wipro Dice ID.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from renowned multinational
   companies.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and access to a growing professional
   network.
   - Specialized training in *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - A curriculum centered on *Generative AI* and *Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with distinguished industry leaders.
   - *Personalized Mentorship*, designed to guide and support you
   throughout your career journey.

*A Notable Opportunity Awaits:*

This is indeed an exceptional opportunity for those who wish to broaden
their knowledge and enhance their professional expertise. We encourage all
interested students to submit their applications promptly to secure a
position in this distinguished program.


Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>



*Program Overview:*


With warm regards and best wishes for your continued success,
*Akash Kapoor*
Senior Academic Counselor
*LaunchED Avenues IIT Bombay*

subject: Important Notice for Participation for CESD - ‚ÄãCUUV101- in -Workshop Mode (Jan 16‚Äì22, 2025)
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings from CHARUSAT! We are excited to welcome you to the Community Engagement and Sustainable Development (CESD) - CUUV101- course in Workshop Mode, scheduled to be held from
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

We are excited to welcome you to the *Community Engagement and Sustainable
Development (CESD) -* CUUV101- course in *Workshop Mode*, scheduled to be
held from *January 16th to 22nd, 2025*, from *9:00 AM to 4:30 PM daily*. As
a two-credit course you opted for at the beginning of the academic year
2024-25 (in lieu of Sports and Physical Training), *your attendance and
active participation in this program are compulsory. Please note that no
post-workshop remedies will be provided.*

*Workshop Schedule:*

   - *Morning Sessions (9:00 AM - 12:00 PM)*
   On-campus interactive discussions, knowledge-sharing, and engaging
   activities.
   - *Lunch Break (12:00 Noon - 1:00 PM)*
   - *Afternoon Sessions (1:00 PM - 4:30 PM)*
   Field visits to nearby villages for hands-on exposure to community
   engagement and sustainable development activities.

*Key Details:*

   - *Dates*: January 16‚Äì22, 2025
   - *Time*: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 4:30 PM
      - *Morning Session*: 9:00 AM ‚Äì 12:00 PM
      - *Lunch Break*: 12:00 PM ‚Äì 1:00 PM
      - *Afternoon Field Visit*: 1:00 PM ‚Äì 4:30 PM
   - *Venue*: RPCP Auditorium, First Floor, Ramanbhai Patel College of
   Pharmacy (Morning Sessions)
   - *Field Visit Location*: Laval Village, Ta- Matar, dist-Kheda
   -  *Transportation for field visits will be arranged by CHARUSAT. *
   - *Please ensure you are present at the Central Lawn on the CHARUSAT
   campus by 1:00 PM each day of the workshop to board the bus.*

This program is designed to provide a *blend of theoretical knowledge and
practical experience*, enabling you to gain a deeper understanding of
community challenges and sustainable practices. We encourage you to
actively participate in both on-campus and field activities to maximize
your learning and contribute meaningfully to the communities you engage
with. *Upon successful completion of this workshop, you will be awarded two
credits on your mark sheet.*

For any questions or further clarification, feel free to contact us at
*9825293046*.

Looking forward to your enthusiastic participation!

*Dr. Dilip Gosai*

*Course Coordinator,**CESD*

*CHARUSAT*


*Dr. Dilip Gosai*
Head
CREDP ( Charusat Rural Education Development Program)
Charotar University of Science & Technology
Accredited *Grade A+* by NAAC

Charotar University of Science & Technology
CHARUSAT Campus - Changa
Off Nadiad-Petlad Highway,
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA
Ph +91-2697-265160 Cell No.+91-98252-93046
Web: www.charusat.ac.in

<http://www.charusat.ac.in/>

is a fantastic opportunity to showcase your talent and be a part of

subject: Selection for Cultural Events ‚Äì Spoural 2025
snippet: Dear Civil and Mechanical Students, We are excited to announce the selection for cultural events, including the Fashion Show and March Procession, as part of Spoural 2025. This annual event brings
content:
Dear Civil and Mechanical Students,

We are excited to announce the selection for cultural events, including the
Fashion Show and March Procession, as part of Spoural 2025. This annual
event brings students together for sports, games, cultural activities, and
more throughout the month of January.

Details of the Selection:

*Date: Tuesday, 7th January 2025*

*Time: 11:10 AM onwards*

*Venue: FM Lab, Room No. 415, Civil-Mechanical Building*


We encourage all interested students to participate and showcase their
talents. Let‚Äôs make Spoural 2025 a memorable celebration of creativity and
teamwork!

Best regards,
CL-ME Council

Contact info:
*Harsh Desai(CL) :9426855695*
*Jayraj Rathod(ME) :9408619939*

subject: The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles | Volume 10 - Issue 1
snippet: Welcome to Quill The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles Greetings from CHARUSAT! In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we are delighted to introduce Quill ‚Äî the official
content:
[Welcome to Quill]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/a31db465432dd089f9e892e8753dafb6c5467911]


THE QUILL: CHARUSAT CHRONICLES

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we
are delighted to introduce QUILL ‚Äî the official newsletter of
CHARUSAT. True to its name, Quill embodies the spirit of creativity,
intellect, and expression that defines our vibrant community.

WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE QUILL?

 	* ACCOLADES: CHARUSAT'S EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Celebrating extraordinary
accomplishments of our students, faculty, and alumni.
 	* RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS: THE EDGE OF EXPLORATION ‚Äì Showcasing
groundbreaking discoveries.
 	* EMINENT SPEAKERS: UNVEILING NEW PERCEPTIONS ‚Äì Dive into engaging
conversations and transformative ideas.
 	* CAMPUS BUZZ: CELEBRATING CAMPUS LIFE ‚Äì Experience the energy and
excitement of campus life.
 	* FACULTY SPOTLIGHT: ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Highlighting the
brilliance of our faculty.
 	* STUDENT SPOTLIGHT: RISING STARS ‚Äì Inspiring stories of our
student community.

Quill is more than just a newsletter; it is a chronicle of our shared
vision, growth, and success. Join us in celebrating the milestones and
moments that make CHARUSAT a hub of inspiration and innovation.

[Quill Cover Page]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/acc0b593868118ea4029db7c89d967632bd3964b]

Warm regards,
THE EDITORIAL TEAM
CHARUSAT

subject: Live Streaming of 14·µó ∞ Convocation Ceremony | CHARUSAT
snippet: Convocation 2025 Dear All, We are happy to inform you that the 14th Convocation Ceremony of CHARUSAT will be live-streamed on YouTube. This year's convocation is a special milestone as we celebrate
content:
[Convocation 2025]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ek299l8d7yebf/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/e45138cac2fcb313e48f69d8e518170e93b8d030]


DEAR ALL,

We are happy to inform you that the 14TH CONVOCATION CEREMONY OF
CHARUSAT will be live-streamed on YouTube. This year's convocation is
a special milestone as we celebrate 25 GLORIOUS YEARS OF ACADEMIC
EXCELLENCE.

Click here to Watch the Ceremony Live
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ek299l8d7yebf/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/280d7aa3c6ab2dce0e4b5ea1d43afda06924cd1e]
DATE: January 4, 2025 | TIME: 5 pm onwards
We invite you to join us virtually and participate in this momentous
occasion. The ceremony will feature the conferment of degrees, awards,
and recognition of our students' outstandingvements.

Please feel free to share the link with your family and friends who
may be interested in watching the ceremony.

We look forward to your virtual presence!

[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/ek299l8d7yebf/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/e45138cac2fcb313e48f69d8e518170e93b8d030]

or before 08/01/2025. The link for the same is given below.

subject: Whistle Blower Policy
snippet: To, All CHARUSAT Family members, The CHARUSAT university believes in upholding high standards of integrity and ethical behaviour and strives to confirm in all its actions to this core value. The
content:
To,
All CHARUSAT Family members,

The CHARUSAT university believes in upholding high standards of integrity
and ethical behaviour and strives to confirm in all its actions to this
core value. The university is engaged with several stakeholders, each being
critical in helping the university to achieve its vision and mission.
Employees are expected to observe high morals by following right conduct
with honesty and that too without any fear.



In view that a policy for ‚ÄúWhistle Blower‚Äù is prepared and circulated for
the information of all the employees, students and stakeholders of the
university.



The purpose of the Whistle Blowing is to correct something wrong or illegal
and not to serve any personal advancement i.e it has to be done in good
faith and for the betterment of the functioning of the university (i.e
academic and administrative).



The Whistle Blower policy is attached herewith for information of all the
CHARUSAT family members.




Regards,


*Dr. Atul Patel*

*Registrar*






Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC


www.charusat.ac.in


-- 
with regards:

*Dr. Dattatraya G. Subhedar*
Associate Professor,
Department of Mechanical Engineering,
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology

*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC*

content:
Dear Students

Kindly note that the following numerals have been set for Therory
(sessional component) (50 marks) & Term Work (Term work) (25 marks) of
course BCME (MEUC102) for the 2024-25 batch (ME/CL/EE).

Theory component   (Out of 50)
Component Marks
Midterm exam 20
CCE Home Assignment 15
Quiz 15
Total 50
Lab component   (Out of 25)
Component Marks
CCE Lab Work 10
Poster Competition/ Presentation 10
Attendance 5
Total 25
*Students should have minimum performance (36% out of 50 marks) in
the Continuous Assessment to appear in the end-semester university
examination.  *

The end semester theory exam and Practical Viva will be of 50 marks and 25
Marks, respectively.

Thank you.

Best Regards,

subject: Re: STEP TALK on Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT in Smart Technologies
snippet: Gentle reminder Event Details: ‚Ä¢ Topic: Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT in Smart Technologies ‚Ä¢ Speaker: Dr. Rutu Parekh, Associate Professor at DA-IICT ‚Ä¢ Date: Friday,
content:
Gentle reminder


*Event Details:*

‚Ä¢ *Topic:* Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT
in Smart Technologies

‚Ä¢ *Speaker:* Dr. Rutu Parekh, Associate Professor at DA-IICT

‚Ä¢ *Date:* Friday, 27 December

‚Ä¢ *Time:* 12:10 PM - 2:10 PM

‚Ä¢ *Venue:* A6 EC/EE Building, Seminar Hall (2nd Floor)




On Thu, 26 Dec 2024 at 09:31, IEEE CSPIT <ieee.charusatsb@gmail.com> wrote:

> We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session, organized by
>  *IEEE CSPIT SB* in collaboration with the *IEEE Gujarat Section*. Join
> us to explore the transformative potential of Embedded Systems and IoT in
> driving smart technologies.
>
>
> *Event Details:*
>
> ‚Ä¢ *Topic:* Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and
> IoT in Smart Technologies
>
> ‚Ä¢ *Speaker:* Dr. Rutu Parekh, Associate Professor at DA-IICT
>
> ‚Ä¢ *Date:* Friday, 27 December
>
> ‚Ä¢ *Time:* 12:10 PM - 2:10 PM
>
> ‚Ä¢ *Venue:* A6 EC/EE Building, Seminar Hall (2nd Floor)
>
>
> *Session Highlights:*
>
> ‚Ä¢ Introduction to Embedded Systems and IoT: Definitions, key concepts,
> and evolution.
>
> ‚Ä¢ Key Components: Microcontrollers, sensors, actuators, and IoT platforms.
>
> ‚Ä¢ Emerging Applications: Smart homes, IIoT, healthcare, and environmental
> monitoring.
>
> ‚Ä¢ Design Challenges: Low-power designs, real-time performance, security,
> and scalability.
>
> ‚Ä¢ Role of AI: Enhancing IoT functionalities through AI and case studies.
>
> ‚Ä¢ Future Trends: 5G, edge computing, and sustainable IoT technologies.
>
>
>
> *About the Speaker:*
>
> *Dr. Rutu Parekh* has extensive expertise in Micro/Nanoelectronics,
> Embedded Systems, and IoT. With academic achievements from Concordia
> University, Universit√© de Sherbrooke, and IIT Bombay, she has contributed
> significantly to military and space application research. She is a
> published author, a technical advisor, and the founder and chair of the
> IEEE NTC Chapter.
>
>
> We encourage you to attend this insightful session and engage with a
> leader in the field.
>
>
> *Fill out the google form to book your seat :*
>
> https://forms.gle/k47fR279xJtD2vtn9
>
>
> Looking forward to your presence!
>
> IEEE CSPIT Student Branch
>
> [image: newlogoieee.png]
>

subject: STEP TALK on Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT in Smart Technologies
snippet: We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session, organized by IEEE CSPIT SB in collaboration with the IEEE Gujarat Section. Join us to explore the transformative potential of Embedded
content:
We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session,
organized by *IEEE
CSPIT SB* in collaboration with the *IEEE Gujarat Section*. Join us to
explore the transformative potential of Embedded Systems and IoT in driving
smart technologies.


*Event Details:*

‚Ä¢ *Topic:* Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT
in Smart Technologies

‚Ä¢ *Speaker:* Dr. Rutu Parekh, Associate Professor at DA-IICT

‚Ä¢ *Date:* Friday, 27 December

‚Ä¢ *Time:* 12:10 PM - 2:10 PM

‚Ä¢ *Venue:* A6 EC/EE Building, Seminar Hall (2nd Floor)


*Session Highlights:*

‚Ä¢ Introduction to Embedded Systems and IoT: Definitions, key concepts, and
evolution.

‚Ä¢ Key Components: Microcontrollers, sensors, actuators, and IoT platforms.

‚Ä¢ Emerging Applications: Smart homes, IIoT, healthcare, and environmental
monitoring.

‚Ä¢ Design Challenges: Low-power designs, real-time performance, security,
and scalability.

‚Ä¢ Role of AI: Enhancing IoT functionalities through AI and case studies.

‚Ä¢ Future Trends: 5G, edge computing, and sustainable IoT technologies.



*About the Speaker:*

*Dr. Rutu Parekh* has extensive expertise in Micro/Nanoelectronics,
Embedded Systems, and IoT. With academic achievements from Concordia
University, Universit√© de Sherbrooke, and IIT Bombay, she has contributed
significantly to military and space application research. She is a
published author, a technical advisor, and the founder and chair of the
IEEE NTC Chapter.


We encourage you to attend this insightful session and engage with a leader
in the field.


*Fill out the google form to book your seat :*

https://forms.gle/k47fR279xJtD2vtn9


Looking forward to your presence!

IEEE CSPIT Student Branch

[image: newlogoieee.png]

Offer for the CHARUSAT Girl Students to watch 31st (2024) Gujarati Movie for free
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family Members, Recently a Gujarati movie entitled '31st (2024)" has been released in theatres. The movie is based on a real life incident, which happened to a girl in Ahmedabad.
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,



Recently a Gujarati movie entitled '*31st (2024)*" has been released in
theatres. The movie is based on a real life incident, which happened to a
girl in Ahmedabad. You can get more information about the film from online
sources.



The producer of the movie has extended the Free Movie Review for *CHARUSAT
Girl Students*. The girl students currently pursuing their studies at
CHARUSAT will get a *free entry in the theatres* after showing her student
I-Card, issued by CHARUSAT, at the ticket counter of the theatre.



Girl students and Lady Faculty members can avail the offer at *Shaan Cinema
‚Äì Anand* and *Lux Cinema - Petlad* till December 28, 2024. The offer is
limited to the scheduled shows of the film. The entry is subject to the
availability of seats. One ticket will be issued for one I-card. The offer
is limited for the film viewing only, other facilities are not the part of
this scheme.



We wish the maximum number of students to avail this offer.



Thank you.




PS: The right of the entry is reserved by the cinema owner.


With regards,
Regards,
Convener/ Co-convener,
ULSC-CHARUSAT.

--

subject: Canada Day by IDP ‚Äì A Unique Study Abroad Opportunity
snippet: Dear Students, We are delighted to inform you about an exciting opportunity to gain valuable insights into studying in Canada through the upcoming "Canada Day by IDP" event, exclusively
content:
Dear Students,



We are delighted to inform you about an exciting opportunity to gain
valuable insights into studying in Canada through the upcoming *"Canada Day
by IDP"* event, exclusively hosted for you at CHARUSAT University in
collaboration with IDP Education.



This event is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of
the opportunities that await in Canada and address common misconceptions
about studying there. Highlights of the event include:



¬∑  *Expert Talk:* "Breaking the Myths about the Present Scenario of
Studying in Canada and Fact-Checking the Enormous Opportunities Awaiting in
Canada."



¬∑  *One-on-One Counseling:* Get personalized guidance and profile
assessments from IDP's Canada team experts.



¬∑  *On-the-Spot Solutions:* Address your queries directly with experienced
counselors.



*Event Details:*

¬∑  *Date:* Tuesday, December 31, 2024

¬∑  *Time:* 11:00 AM ‚Äì 4:00 PM

¬∑  *Venue:* IIIM Auditorium, CHARUSAT University Campus

¬∑  *Registration Link:* Register Here
<https://forms.gle/sNBS7gZavGohxxtG8> (Please
use your CHARUSAT email ID to register.)



This is a remarkable opportunity to explore the possibilities of studying
in Canada and receive tailored advice for the academic journey. We
encourage you to register and make the most of this exclusive event.



Seats are limited, so please register as soon as you can to secure your
participation.



If you have any questions, please get in touch with Dr. Vijay Makwana at
+91 99983 80041.




Thanks & Regards,

*Executive Officer (Corporate Communications)*

subject: Successful Blood Donation Camp ‚Äì A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT Family
snippet: Successful Blood Donation Camp ‚Äì A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT Family Dear CHARUSAT Family, We are pleased to share the remarkable success of the Blood Donation Camp held on December 20th, 2024
content:
* Successful Blood Donation Camp ‚Äì A Heartfelt Thank You to the CHARUSAT
Family*

Dear CHARUSAT Family,

We are pleased to share the remarkable success of the Blood Donation Camp
held on December 20th, 2024. This event was made possible thanks to the
unwavering dedication of our entire CHARUSAT Family.

A special mention goes to *the student team*, whose active participation
and enthusiasm played a pivotal role in making this life-saving initiative
a reality. Their commitment to service and compassion truly reflects the
core values of our university.

For your reference, we have attached *the list of student participants *along
with *some glimpses of the event*.

Such events are a testament to the strong spirit of collaboration at
CHARUSAT. Your encouragement and involvement are key to inspiring us to
organize more impactful activities in the future.

We are grateful for your continued support and look forward to your
participation in future endeavors.

Together, let‚Äôs continue to make a meaningful difference in society and
strengthen our commitment to community service.


---Thanks & Regards---
Mr. Kishan Patel
Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS Unit
CHARUSAT, Changa 388421

--

subject: [IMPORTANT]IIT CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY (GUJRAT) Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT Roorkee's Cognizance: a 2-Month Training and Internship
content:
*DEAR STUDENTS*


*OF*

*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY(GUJRAT)Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
Roorkee's Cognizance*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious companies including *Cisco, Meta
(Facebook), IBM*, and other leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
you get shortlisted you will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>




*STUDENTS ENROLLED UNDER SCHOLARSHIP :*
NAME YEAR DOMAIN COLLEGE
Jahnavi rajput  1 st Year GRAPHICS DESIGN CHARUSAT
Maitra shah  1 st Year FINANCE CHARUSAT
Goyani Tisha Vinubhai  2 nd Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Ishan Gupta 1 st Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Daksh Delawala  1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Milind Vinayak Patil  2 st Year ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHARUSAT
Roht Eknath Wagh  1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE)
CHARUSAT
OM VILAS MAHALLE  1 st Year APP DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Sanket Kailas Garudkar 1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Patel Sarthak Rajeshkumar  1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Maheshwari Saumil Dineshkumar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Bhatt xama dharmendra Kumar  1 st Year IOT + ROBOTICS (HARDWARE KIT)
CHARUSAT
Patel Rudra Yatin  1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Taksh 1 st Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Gohel Rohan Sandipbhai 3 rd Year VLSI CHARUSAT
JAIVIN TRIVEDI  1 st Year HYBRID ELECTRIC VECHILES CHARUSAT
Tushar Makhnan 1 st Year DIGITAL MARKETING CHARUSAT
Ritik Kumar  1 st Year ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE CHARUSAT
Harsh Singh  1 st Year ROBOTICS CHARUSAT
Sravan Kumar 1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE) CHARUSAT
Dhruv Pawar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Utsav Dave 1 st Year EMBEDDED SYSTEM CHARUSAT
Suhanee Yadav 1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Patel Kashish Rakeshkumar  1 st Year AUTOCAD CHARUSAT
Rudra Panchal  1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED CERTIFICATE)
CHARUSAT
Sutariya Shreyansh Vikaskumar 1 st Year VLSI CHARUSAT
Preya Dhangar  2 nd Year WEB DEVELOPMENT CHARUSAT
Tolat Mahek Rajeshbhai 3 rd Year Android App Development CHARUSAT
* Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after registering.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week at 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*
*HR MANAGER'S TNK*

subject: Request for Donors ‚Äì 10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of Mangal Baa (‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á)
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family Members, Greetings We are pleased to announce that the 10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of Mangla Baa (‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤‡™æ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á) is scheduled to be held on 20th December 2024
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,*

Greetings

We are pleased to announce that the *10th Blood Donation Camp in Memory of
Mangla Baa (*‡™Æ‡™Ç‡™ó‡™≤‡™æ ‡™¨‡™æ ‡™®‡´Ä ‡™™‡´Å‡™£‡´ç‡™Ø‡™§‡™ø‡™•‡™ø ‡™®‡™ø‡™Æ‡™ø‡™§‡´á) is scheduled to be held on *20th
December 2024*, from *08:00 AM to 04:00 PM* at *"AASTHA," Indukaka Marg,
Vallabh Vidyanagar*.

To ensure the success of this noble cause, we humbly request All Faculty
Members, Staff Members and Students For kind support in Blood Donation.
Kindly *fill out the attached Registration form* to confirm participation.
We are expecting a Participation of at least * Minimum 10 Members per
department/Institute* to make this event a success.

Registration Link:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeK3xjEBzWG-Op23zkYgo6d8fNl-Mv9AC7FCApND6Ble1-AuQ/viewform?usp=sf_link

For more details, please refer to the *attached brochure*.

   - Reporting Time at Central Lawn on 20/12/2024 : 09:10 AM on Sharp


   - Transportation Will Provided by CHARUSAT.
   - Refreshment will Provided by the Organizer.

Your small act of kindness can make a big difference in saving lives. Let‚Äôs
unite and *be heroes* by promoting the spirit of donation and service.

*P.S.: @Counselors Please Pass this Information to Students Via **WhatsApp*
*Group.*

Thank you for your cooperation and support!

--

Warm Regards,
Kishan Patel
Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS Unit.

--

content:
On 22nd december there is a final selection for kabbadi, tug of war, and
volleyball teams. Those who want to participate, this is the last chance
for them. Be present on the date given. On the day of selection all should
be in proper sports attire. The time for selection will be provided soon.

subject: Hello everyone hope this email finds you well. Poster making Competition for Students & Staff of CHARUSAT
snippet: Dear Students, Energy Conservation Cell-CHARUSAT has organized a hand-drawn poster-making competition for students and staff of CHARUSAT on the occasion of "National Energy Conservation Day: 14th
content:
Dear Students,
Energy Conservation Cell-CHARUSAT has organized a hand-drawn poster-making
competition for students and staff of CHARUSAT on the occasion of "National
Energy Conservation Day: 14th December 2024."

The theme of the poster is "Innovations in Energy Saving."  The participant
has to submit an *A3 size hand-drawn pencil sketch poster *to the Head,
Electrical Engineering Department, CSPIT (Room No. 136, A6 Building,
CAPIT) before 6 January 2025, 04.30 pm.

First three winners will be awarded prize money.
No Entry Fee.
E-certificate will be provided to all participants.
For more details, contact: Head, Electrical Engineering Dept., CSPIT.

Regards,
[image: Innovations in Energy Saving.jpg]

-- 
Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel
Associate professor & Head,
Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421
Ta: Petlad.
Phone:02697 265041

My Web Page: https://sites.google.com/charusat.ac.in/nilaypatel/home

--

subject: Practical Viva/ Exam of CLUC102- Engineering Mechanics Regarding
snippet: Dear all, The Practical Viva/Exam for CLUC102 - Engineering Mechanics for the CL/ME, Mechanical, and Electrical Divisions is scheduled as follows: Date Time Subject 18-12-2024 Wednesday 9.00AM to 04.30
content:
Dear all,

The Practical Viva/Exam for CLUC102 - Engineering Mechanics for the CL/ME,
Mechanical, and Electrical Divisions is scheduled as follows:

*Date*

*Time*

*Subject*

18-12-2024

Wednesday

9.00AM to 04.30 PM

CLUC102- EM

(Branch- Civil+ Mechanical)(A,B and C Batch)

19-12-2024

Thursday

9.00AM to 04.30 PM

CLUC102- EM

(Branch- Mechanical) (A,B and C Batch)

20-12-2024

Friday

9.00AM to 04.30 PM

CLUC102- EM

(Branch- Electrical) (A,B and C Batch)


*Please report at 9:00 AM in room 528B for the viva, which will begin
promptly at 9:00 AM. Reporting Time : Batch A reports at 9:00 AM, Batch B
at 10:30 AM, and Batch C at 11:45 AM.*

Note: You will not be allowed to take the practical exam if your lab manual
and tutorial files are not certified by your lab teacher. It is mandatory
to bring your lab manual, tutorial file, hall ticket, and ID card. Failure
to present any of these will result in an AB mark in the Practical
Exam/Viva.

Thanks and Regards,
-
*Pinal Patel*
*M.E. (Structural Engineering)*

subject: Faculty Feedback & Faculty nominationin E-Governance
snippet: All the first-year students are informed to fill in the feedback before December 14, 2024. You may fill the feedback form from your E-Governance account. Link for feedback is mentioned below. It is
content:
All the first-year students are informed to fill in the feedback before
December* 14, 2024*. You may fill the feedback form from
your E-Governance account. Link for feedback is mentioned below.
It is mandatory for all the students to fill feedback form.

https://charusat.edu.in:912/eGovernance/

Counselors are requested to take follow-up for the same.

*Students also have to nominate the faculties in the e-governance through
the Teacher award nomination tab just below Faculty Feedback tab.*

Students shall nominate the teachers based on the perception mainly
depending upon the following parameters.
*Positive Educational Impact:  *
Clear evidence of enhancing students' learning and academic performance.
*Innovative Teaching:*
Utilization of innovative and effective teaching methods.
*Student Engagement and Inspiration:*
Demonstrable ability to engage and motivate students.
*Support and Accessibility:*
Providing support and guidance to students beyond classroom hours.
*Community Contribution:*
Active involvement in institute-wide initiatives and extracurricular
activities.

Thanks & Regards,
*Dr. Bhavin Mehta,*





*Assistant Professor,Department of Mechanical Engineering,Faculty of
Technology & EngineeringCharotar University of Science &
TechnologyEducation Campus Changa -388421 Dist: Anand, Gujarat India*
*Ext. No.:5326*

subject: Survey form for planning the Certificate course on Artificial Intelligence(AI) in Mechanical Engineering
snippet: Dear All, Greetings of the day! Here, I am attaching a survey form for planning the Certificate course on Artificial Intelligence(AI) in Mechanical Engineering. Please read its details carefully and if
content:
Dear All,

Greetings of the day!

Here, I am attaching a survey form for planning the *Certificate course on
Artificial Intelligence(AI) in Mechanical Engineering*. Please read its
details carefully and if you are interested then give your response to this
survey form. Not interested members can leave/ignore this form.

*Link:* https://forms.gle/wdypT2nYek88rYVo6
<https://forms.gle/MkZfDFurwz3uNnWN7>

---
*Details of Proposed Course:*
This course is proposed based on the review conducted by the Industry and
is specific for Mechanical Engineering Students. It is a certificate course
(Value adding course) which covers:

Starting of Course: From Dec 2024 (Exact date will be shared after this
survey form)
Duration: 60 Hours
Registration fees: 1000/- Rs.
Batch Size: Only 20 students
Key Points: Industrial visits & Sessions of industry experts, Practical
exposure of AI in Mechanical based Industry, Introduction of AI-Expert
sessions from academics, AI in Mechanical Engineering: Case studies of AI
in manufacturing/ Mechanical/Tribological characterization/ Industry
4.0/Robotics, Knowledge of Programming, Assignment, Project, Online
Materials, Offline/Online Sessions.
[image: image.png]
*Please read the above details carefully related to the course and if you
are interested then give your response to this survey from. Not interested
members can leave/ignore this form.*
---
With Regards,

*Dr. Sagar Chokshi,*
Associate Professor,
Department of Mechanical Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering,
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT),
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC
Education Campus Changa -388421
At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist: Anand, (Gujarat) India.
Ph.No. +91-2697-265329; Mob. No. +91-9726622007.

subject: Tentative marks of CLUC102- Continuous Evaluation Internal Marks Out of 50
snippet: Dear all, All the best for exams...... Please find attached herewith the Tentative marks of CLUC102- Continuous Evaluation Internal Marks Out of 50 for your reference. Continuous evaluation components
content:
Dear all,

All the best for exams......


Please find attached herewith the Tentative marks of CLUC102- Continuous
Evaluation Internal Marks Out of 50 for your reference.

Continuous evaluation components as discussed in the class is: Mid term (20
marks) + Working model / online course (10 marks) + Presentation marks
those who present their model in exhibition(out of 5) + NB marks (out of
5) + quizzes marks (out of 10)


Thanks and Regards,

*M.E. (Structural Engineering)*

 --------- Forwarded message ---------

From: *Ritesh Patel* <riteshpatel.adm@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Dec 5, 2024 at 11:10‚ÄØAM
Subject: BTECH- 1st Semester and MOTAT -1st Semester Seating Arrangement
To: Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology <
principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <
principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>, COE Exam <coe.exam@charusat.ac.in>, Dr.
Abhilash Shukla <abhilashshukla.mca@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT <
dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Dhaval Bhoi <dhavalbhoi.ce@charusat.ac.in>, HOD
Group <hod@charusat.ac.in>, Radhika Patel <radhikapatel.it@charusat.ac.in>,
Principal CIPS <principal.cips@charusat.ac.in>, hemant kumar <
hemantkumar.cips@charusat.ac.in>, dhara patel <
dharapatel.cips@charusat.ac.in>



Dear Madam/Sir,



Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in the
email attachment. Students are required to uphold decorum in the
examination hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic
devices are strictly prohibited within the exam hall. Bags must be left
outside, and it is mandatory to wear an ID card. Students have to take
their seat in the exam hall at least 15 minute prior to the exam time.

Department is requested to assign one supervisor for every 45 students in
Hall (Each classroom will have *a separate supervisor* to monitor the
students. Departments are requested to allocate one supervisor per
classroom.)

*A) **Exam Venue*:

The examination will be conducted in the following locations:

   - *Exam Hall 201*: Located on the first floor of the Multi-Utility
   Building.
   - *Exam Hall 301*: Located on the second floor of the Multi-Utility
   Building.
   - The Multi-Utility Building is situated *behind the MBA Building*.

*B) Exam Venue*:
The examination will take place at the following locations in the *IIIM
Institute*:

   - *Ground Floor*: Room Nos. IT1 to IT8
   - *First Floor*: Room Nos. 204, 205, 208, 214, 215, and 216

All students are required to enter the campus through the Karoli Gate and
follow the signboards to reach the Multi-Utility Building.



*Please verify the attached student seating arrangement in this email *and
share both the seating arrangement and the above message with the students.

Thank you.

content:

internal quiz have been released. Additionally, the list of students marked

subject: D2D students : Year 2024-25 MYSY Fresh registration is open
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission / verification start for D2D students admitted in the year 2024-25 at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì CSPIT ADMIN OFFICE Room No
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission /
verification start for
D2D students admitted in the year 2024-25 *at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì CSPIT
ADMIN OFFICE Room No 101.*

*Please take a note of the following points before submitting
the documents:*

A.  Lock the Application and take printout of form. *P**rint out of
Application form from the WhatsApp image is not acceptable. *

B.  All uploaded scan documents *must be clearly visible**.*

C.  Submit the application form with photocopies of all uploaded
documents *(except
IT Form).*

D. Please upload a fee receipt which contains *Revenue Stamp and sign by
the Account Section of CHARUSAT. *

E. Student must write *Enrolment Number (ID No.) in the MYSY form.*

F. Upload Sahay renewal certificate *(Will get through your e governance
login) *from head of institute *in original with sign of Principal Sir (Not
blank).*

*G. **Write barcode ID at the top of the form* which will help us to
retrieve the data immediately.

*H. No need of Photograph with the Application.*


*Special Note:*

1.      Students are requested to *just drop the application in the tray
placed at said office.*

2.      To save time, *there is no need to stay at said office, timely
appropriate action will be taken by us.*


      *REFER MYSY SITE FOR MORE INFO. (**http://mysy.guj.nic.in
<http://mysy.guj.nic.in/>**)*

-- 
Thanks,
*Yatin Talati*

Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421
www.charusat.ac.in

--

subject: Fwd: Urgent Reminder: Upload Student Aadhar Information for Digilocker by 7th Dec 2024
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dean FTE CHARUSAT <dean.fte@charusat.ac.in> Date: Mon, Dec 2, 2024 at 4:07 PM Subject: Urgent Reminder: Upload Student Aadhar Information for
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dean FTE CHARUSAT <dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Dec 2, 2024 at 4:07‚ÄØPM
Subject: Urgent Reminder: Upload Student Aadhar Information for Digilocker
by 7th Dec 2024
To: Mechanical <mech@charusat.ac.in>, Sujal Dadhaniya <
sujaldadhaniya.adm@charusat.ac.in>, Axat Patel <axatpatel.me@charusat.ac.in>,
Kundan Patel <kundanpatel.me@charusat.ac.in>


Counselors/Supervisor should complete the task by informing students before
7th, Dec 2024.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: COE Exam <coe.exam@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Dec 2, 2024 at 3:41‚ÄØPM
Subject: Urgent Reminder: Upload Student Aadhar Information for Digilocker
by 7th Dec 2024
To: Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology <
principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, Principal ARIP <
principal.arip@charusat.ac.in>, Principal CIPS <
principal.cips@charusat.ac.in>, Principal RPCP CHARUSAT <
principal.rpcp@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <
principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>, Principal CMPICA CHARUSAT <
principal.cmpica@charusat.ac.in>, Principal PDPIAS CHARUSAT <
principal.pdpias@charusat.ac.in>, Principal IIIM - CHARUSAT <
principal.iiim@charusat.ac.in>, Principal MTIN CHARUSAT <
principal.mtin@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Dean FMD CHARUSAT <dean.fmd@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT <
dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FPH CHARUSAT <dean.fph@charusat.ac.in>, Dean
FAS CHARUSAT <dean.fas@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FCA CHARUSAT <
dean.fca@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FMS CHARUSAT <dean.fms@charusat.ac.in>, Dean
FOH <dean.foh@charusat.ac.in>, Dean Academic <dean.academic@charusat.ac.in>,
Ritesh Patel <riteshpatel.adm@charusat.ac.in>, Ritesh Patel <
riteshpatel.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Mitesh Patel <miteshpatel.adm@charusat.ac.in>,
Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>, Atul Patel <
atulpatel.mca@charusat.ac.in>


Respected Principal,

I hope this message finds you well. As per the directive from the
Government of India, we are required to upload all academic records on
Digilocker. In this regard, we need the student's Aadhar Card Number, Name
as per Aadhar Card, and Mobile Number linked with Aadhar Card.

Despite sending multiple reminders to students and the department via
email, there are still some students who have not updated their Aadhar Card
Number, Name as per Aadhar Card, and Mobile Number linked with Aadhar Card
in their CHARUSAT e-governance profile.

Exam Section of CHARUSAT is going to upload Student's Result Related
information of year 2021-22, 2022-23 and 2023-24 on Digilocker from 9th
Dec, 2024 onwards. Last date from GoI is 31st Dec 2024,

In case, if result information is not uploaded on Digilocker portal,
students will not get any information from Digilocker.

You requested to inform students to upload the above information as soon as
possible.

This is the last reminder for the uploading information before 7th, Dec
2024.

-- 
COE, Exam Section
Charotar University of Science and Technology

--

Thanks for choosing Fusion. A Fusion hub is a centralized workspace for you and your team, offering:

* Real-time collaboration
* Version control and history tracking
* User access management

subject: Schedule for Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz
snippet: Dear Students, We hope you're doing well. Please note the schedule for the upcoming Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz as part of your evaluation process: Quiz 1: Foundation
content:
Dear Students,

We hope you're doing well. Please note the schedule for the upcoming
Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz + Foundation Course Quiz as part of your
evaluation process:

Quiz 1: Foundation Course (External Exam Quiz)
Date: 07/12/2024
Time: 3:00 to 3:30 PM
Format: Online (25 Marks)


Quiz 2: Engineering Physics - 1 (2nd Internal Quiz)
Date:   07/12/2024
Time:   3:30 to 4:00 PM
Format: Online (20 Marks)

Both quizzes are mandatory and the Google form link will be shared closer
to the date.


Best regards,
Sanni

--

subject: ME146 EG submission guideline
snippet: Dear All, Please do the submission of MEUC101 EG using sheet binders. Yellow color for sheet binder- FYME FYCL- Pink color for sheet binder FYEE- Green color for sheet binder Sequence: Binder paper==
content:
Dear All,

Please do the submission of MEUC101 EG using sheet binders.

Yellow color for sheet binder- FYME
FYCL- Pink color for sheet binder
FYEE- Green color for sheet binder

Sequence:
Binder paper==> Sheet-1==> Sheet-2 (Pages-2) ==> Sheet-3==> Sheet-4 ==> Binder
paper (Staple it)

Certificate (left side)  and Index (right side) on top side of first binder
paper

*Submission Deadline: 02 Dec 2024-FYCL/ME & FYEE *
*                                       03 Dec 2024 -FYME*

---
Regards,

*Dr. Sagar Chokshi,*

subject: Fwd: Important Instruction for staff and students for Parking during 29-30, November 2024
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Deputy Registrar (HR and General Admin.) CHARUSAT <dy.registrar.hrd@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Nov 28, 2024 at 4:46 PM Subject: Important Instruction
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Deputy Registrar (HR and General Admin.) CHARUSAT <
dy.registrar.hrd@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Nov 28, 2024 at 4:46‚ÄØPM
Subject: Important Instruction for staff and students for Parking during
29-30, November 2024
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,


There will be a University function on 30-11-2024. In context to that, *All
are requested to follow the following parking arrangements during
29-11-2024 (Friday) and 30-11-2024 (Saturday) : *

   1. Four-wheel vehicles shall be parked in the plot behind the PDPIAS
   building.
   2. Two-wheel vehicles shall be parked at CHARUSAT Hospital Parking Area,
   Opp. Karoli Road Gate.



All are requested to please cooperate with security personnel.  Also,
convey the message to students for the same.



Thanks and Regards.



Rajendra Solanki

I/c. Dy. Registrar (HR & General Admin)

Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa -388 421

Contact : +91-2697-265011, 265021,

Ext.- 5004

Mobile: +91-9924020897



Accredited Grade A+ by NAAC

subject: Re: Engineering Mechanics MCQ Test (Internal Evaluation) on 28/11/2024
snippet: Gentle Reminder Dear All, As conveyed earlier, the online quiz will begin sharply at 7:30 PM and will close at 7:45 PM today. You are requested to join on time to avoid any issues. Note: Class
content:
*Gentle Reminder*

*Dear All,*

As conveyed earlier, the online *quiz* will begin *sharply at 7:30 PM* and
will close at *7:45 PM today*.

You are *requested to join on time* to avoid any issues.

*Note:*
Class representatives of both classes are instructed to inform all
concerned students to join the quiz promptly.

*No excuses or requests* will be entertained if missed.

*Regards,*

subject: Mandatory Safety Reminder for CHARUSAT family: Helmet & Seat Belt Compliance ‚Äì NSS Initiative
snippet: Dear Charusat Family Members, Greetings From Charusat NSS Unit We would like to inform you that it is now mandatory for all Students,Staff and faculty Members to: Wear helmets while riding two-wheelers
content:
Dear  Charusat Family Members,

Greetings From Charusat NSS Unit

We would like to inform you that it is now *mandatory* for all
Students,Staff and faculty Members to:

   - *Wear helmets* while riding two-wheelers.
   - *Fasten seat belts* when driving or traveling in a car.

To ensure adherence, *NSS Volunteers* *will be stationed at both university
gates to monitor compliance and raise awareness.* We kindly ask everyone to
be *polite and cooperative* with them, as they are working to safeguard
your safety.

This initiative is *compulsory* and has been implemented to maintain a safe
environment for all members of the CHARUSAT community.

Your cooperation is crucial to the success of this initiative. Let‚Äôs work
together to make our campus safer.

Thank you for your Valuable support and understanding .


--
Regards,
Kishan Patel
NSS Program Coordinator
CHARUSAT NSS UNIT

--

subject* has been arranged on *30 november 2024 from 12.30 p.m.to

subject: Submission Deadline for Journal and Lab Manual ‚Äì Engineering Physics-I
snippet: Dear Students, This is a reminder regarding submitting your Journal and Lab Manual for the subject Engineering Physics-I. Please note the following details: Submission Deadline: on/before 30th November
content:
Dear Students,

This is a reminder regarding submitting your *Journal* and *Lab Manual* for
the subject *Engineering Physics-I*. Please note the following details:

   - *Submission Deadline:* on/before 30th November 2024
   - *Where to Submit:* Respective lab-in-charge
   - *Requirements:* Ensure all experiments are completed, signed, and
   properly documented in the journal and lab manual. Moreover, Journals must
   be certified. *(Signed on certificate/first page)*

Timely submission is mandatory, No submissions will be accepted after the
above-mentioned deadline.

Best regards,
Sanni

--

*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences

subject: Announcement: SPOURAL'25 - A Celebration of Sports and Cultural!
snippet: Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council! We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from *6th
content:
Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council!



We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual
sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from **6th January to
31st January 2025*.* Mark your calendars for a month of energy, enthusiasm,
and excellence!



Event Schedule:



**Sports Competitions: 6th January to 28th January,2025**



**Cultural Events: 29th January to 31st January,2025**



This year, we are excited to expand our sports categories with the
*addition of Handball and Ultimate Frisbee* for students and Chess and
Table Tennis for Faculty, bringing fresh opportunities for athletes to
shine. With these new additions, *SPOURAL'25 promises to be bigger and
better than ever!*



**Important Note:**



This is a general announcement for all Institutes/Departments. We encourage
you to start your team selection and gear up for the exciting competitions
ahead. Let‚Äôs showcase our collective talent, teamwork, and enthusiasm!



Stay tuned for further details regarding registrations, event line-ups, and
schedules. Together, let‚Äôs make SPOURAL'25 an unforgettable celebration of
sportsmanship and culture.





Warm regards,


*Convener,*


*University Level Central Students Council (ULSC).*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: Reminder MSUD101 Quiz II(22/11/2024 at 11:15)
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. The link will be shared on your institute mail ID. Make
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 22/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25.
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
During the quiz, if you face any problem, then consult me in room no 309,
2nd floor, Ec Ee building CSPIT.
Re-quiz will not be taken in case you remain absent.


*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

subject: Re: Engineering Mechanics MCQ Test (Internal Evaluation) on 28/11/2024
snippet: Dear Students, Please treat the following email as final with minor corrections: As part of the CLUV102 _Engineering Mechanics pedagogy and internal evaluation, an MCQ test will be conducted online.
content:
Dear Students,

Please treat the following email as final with minor corrections:

As part of the *CLUV102* _*Engineering Mechanics* pedagogy and internal
evaluation, an MCQ test will be conducted online.

The details are as follows:

   - *Topics:* CG, Friction, Truss, Kinetics, and Kinematics
   - *Date:* 28th November 2024 (Thursday)
   - *Time:* 7:30 PM onwards
   - *Platform:* Google Form (Online)

Please note that no excuses or queries will be entertained after the
examination.

*Note:* The Class Representative (CR) is requested to ensure all students
are informed.

Regards,

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear Students of Charotar University of Science and Technology FINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND JANUARY BATCH Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance IIT Roorkee, is offering a 2-month Training +
content:
Dear Students of

*Charotar University of Science and TechnologyFINAL CALL FOR DECEMBER AND
JANUARY BATCH*

Teachnook, in collaboration with Cognizance *IIT Roorkee*, is offering a
2-month Training + Internship program. This opportunity is available for
every department with fixed slots. We invite you to complete the
application form to secure your spot.

Congratulations to all who have successfully enrolled in the Industrial
Training & Internship Program. We hope you found the* Induction Session*
 valuable.

*Application Deadline: 12:00 PM [19-11-2024]*

*  Application Form  *


*https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9 <https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9>*
*REFERRAL ID: DICE CSAT *(For CHARUSAT College Students only)



*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.




*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*
Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

subject:
New announcement: "Dear all B batch students,

Your lab‚Ä¶"
snippet: Notification settings CLUC102- Engineering Mechanics Civil+ Mechanical New announcement Dear all B batch students, Your lab manual and tutorial submission of following experiments and Tutorials is on
content:
Notification settings  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/s&Email=24me083@charusat.edu.in>
CLUC102- Engineering Mechanics Civil+ Mechanical  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NjgxMjI4ODAxNjY2&Email=24me083@charusat.edu.in>
New announcement

Dear all B batch students,

Your lab manual and tutorial submission of following experiments and  
Tutorials is on 19/11/2024 in room no 528 B at 11: 30 am.

Tutorials:

    - Law of Parallelogram of Forces
    - Law of Triangle of Forces
    - Coplanar concurrent force system
    - Moment and couple
    - Coplanar non- concurrent force system
    - Centroid of 1D
    - Centroid of 2D
    - Truss

Experiments:

    - Law
    of Parallelogram of Forces
    - Law of Triangle of Forces
    - Equilibrium
    of Co-Planar Concurrent Force System (Universal Force Table and Polygon  
Law of
    Forces)
    - Coefficient
    of Static Friction
    - Center
    of Gravity of Plane Lamina
    - Analysis
    of  Simple Roof Truss

See details  
<https://accounts.google.com/AccountChooser?continue=https://classroom.google.com/c/NjgxMjI4ODAxNjY2/p/NzMxMDUzNzUxNjM1&Email=24me083@charusat.edu.in>

subject: Re: Midterm exam syllabus for MEUC101 Engineering Graphics
snippet: Same syllabus for next midterm exam 1. Fundamentals of Engineering Drawing 1.1 Importance of engineering drawing, drawing instruments and materials, BIS and ISO 1.2 Different types of lines used in
content:
Same syllabus for next midterm exam

1. Fundamentals of Engineering Drawing
1.1 Importance of engineering drawing, drawing instruments and materials,
BIS and ISO
1.2 Different types of lines used in engineering practice, methods of
projections as per SP 46-1988.
1.3 Engineering scale.
Lab 4 topics: title block, types of lines, geometric const. & dimensioning
system
2.Projections of Points and Lines
3.Projections of Planes
5.Orthographic Projection

subject: Regarding Update Aadhar Details in e-Governance Profile
snippet: Dear Vadhvana Siddhi Tarunkumar, This message is being sent to you by CHARUSAT University because your information is not validated by the Daglocker portal of the Government of India. Please check and
content:
DEAR VADHVANA SIDDHI TARUNKUMAR,

This message is being sent to you by CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY BECAUSE YOUR
INFORMATION IS NOT VALIDATED BY THE DAGLOCKER PORTAL of the Government
of India. 

PLEASE CHECK AND UPDATE THE FOLLOWING FIELDS IN YOUR PROFILE:

 	* AADHAAR NUMBER: Check and update your proper Aadhaar number
 	* STUDENT NAME AS PER AADHAAR: The name must match exactly as per
your Aadhaar card.
 	* STUDENT MOBILE NUMBER AS PER AADHAAR: This should be the mobile
number you registered when creating your Aadhaar.

IN CASE OF ANY ISSUES, PLEASE CONTACT THE STUDENT SECTION AT CHARUSAT
UNIVERSITY DURING COLLEGE WORKING HOURS.

PLEASE UPDATE YOUR DETAILS WITHIN 2 DAYS.

YOU CAN UPDATE YOUR DETAILS BY VISITING THE E-GOVERNANCE PORTAL: 

FOR UPDATING E-GOVERNANCE PROFILE
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/qz417qhnz7dbd/track-url/pj339pynp62eb/ee0b1b1eee5db8cbe8a07faaaf458e9ac3ac46e5]


THANK YOU FOR YOUR PROMPT ATTENTION TO THIS MATTER.

CHARUSAT UNIVERSITY

subject: Class test of EC and CL+ME(Div 2) for Absent student
snippet: Dear Students Please note that the class test of Ec div 1 2 3, Cl, and Me div 2 was conducted on 21/10/2024 and 22/10/2024. Certain students were absent from the class test. I have decided to take
content:
Dear Students
Please note that the class test of Ec div 1 2 3, Cl, and Me div 2 was
conducted on 21/10/2024 and 22/10/2024. *Certain students were absent from
the class test. I have decided to take class test for such students
who remain absent on said dates as per the following schedule.*

Date : 14/11/2024
Room : 310 Ec ee Building 2nd floor
TIme: 11;20 Am to 11:40 AM(30 Minutes)

This is the last chance, and if you remain absent, your absence will be
considered 00 Marks for the calculation of 50 Marks. The syllabus for the
exam is as follows :

Syllabus:
Unit 3 Matrix
Unit 4 Partial derivative
Unit 5 Application of Partial Derivative (up to the Lagrange's method)



*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*

*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *

Thank you for choosing SolidWorks desktop as your design tool for your
competition.  We know you have other design tool options and we appreciate
your support.



Your SOLIDWORKS Student Sponsorship includes the following products with
one serial number. *This software is for the team‚Äôs personal computers and
not for school computers*.

   - CAD Premium


   - Sustainability


   - Electrical Professional


   - MBD (Model-Based Definition)


   - Simulation Premium


   - Composer


   - Flow Simulation


   - CAM Professional


   - Motion


   - Visualize Professional


   - Plastics Premium





Your SOLIDWORKS sponsorship also includes *access to hundred hours of
training content* on MySolidWorks. To unlock your MySolidworks access,
please watch this video <https://www.solidworks.com/mysolidworks-students>.

*Before installing the new version of SOLIDWORKS, please uninstall all
previous SOLIDWORKS versions and review the* System Requirements
<https://www.solidworks.com/support/system-requirements>.



*Please follow the instructions below to download the product:*



   - Got to: www.solidworks.com/SEK and complete the form (first name, last
   name email address, select ‚Äústudent team‚Äù on dropdown)



   - Under product information



   - Select Yes ( *I already have a serial number)*



   - Choose *2024* version



¬∑      SolidWorks CAD serial number:            *90200087455739866QWTFWJB*



   - Here are the number of activations on each serial number:  *8*





If you do not activate the license after installing, you will only receive
a 30-day license.  Please give this serial number out to team members *only*.
*This serial number will expire July 31, 2026*.



Installation and activation instructions are here:
*www.solidworks.com/installation_instructions*
<http://www.solidworks.com/installation_instructions>



If for any reason you have a problem with the software installation, please
go here www.solidworks.com/studentsupport.



To learn the latest about SolidWorks Education and all of our products,
please visit:
*WWW.SOLIDWORKS.COM/EDULAUNCH* <http://www.solidworks.com/EDULAUNCH>



Good luck to your team and we hope to see you at the competitions.



Please follow us on Instagram:@solidworksedu, Facebook
<https://www.facebook.com/SolidWorksEducation> and Twitter
<https://twitter.com/SOLIDWORKSedu>.



SOLIDWORKS Early Engagement Team

subject: Fwd: Participation of Students, Teachers, and Administrators in the ‚ÄòAsk Our Expert‚Äô Programme on NAD-ABC on November 8, 2024 -Regarding
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply6@aicte-india.org> Date: Thu, 7 Nov, 2024, 11:00 pm Subject: Participation of Students, Teachers, and Administrators in the
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply6@aicte-india.org>
Date: Thu, 7 Nov, 2024, 11:00‚ÄØpm
Subject: Participation of Students, Teachers, and Administrators in the
‚ÄòAsk Our Expert‚Äô Programme on NAD-ABC on November 8, 2024 -Regarding


Dear Madam/Sir,
Greetings from All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) ..!

We are pleased to inform you that the Ministry of Electronics and
Information Technology (MeitY) is organizing a *online live talk show *on
the *Academic Bank of Credits(ABC)*, a project of the Ministry of Education
(MoE) aimed at providing a seamless, student-centric learning experience
while enhancing the ease of credit accumulation and transfer for students
across institutions.

As part of the outreach efforts under the Digital India Initiative, MeitY
is hosting the 3rd episode of the ‚ÄúAsk Our Expert Programme‚Äù focused on
ABC-NAD. This programme will be held *on November 8, 2024, starting at 1 PM
onwards*. *The live talk show will be conducted by experts from the
government, featuring focused discussions aimed at equipping faculty,
students, and administrators from various Academic Institutions (AIs) with
essential knowledge about the benefits, implementation process, and
opportunities associated with the ABC*.Given the role that these
stakeholders play in the success of the Academic Bank of Credits, we
earnestly urge you to encourage and facilitate their participation in this
session.

The details for joining the webinar are mentioned below:-

¬∑         *Date*: 8th November 2024
¬∑       *  Time*: 1 PM onwards
¬∑         *Platform*: YouTube Official Digital India Channel
¬∑         *Link*: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dqIoGwIXjoM

This session will not only deepen the understanding of participants about
ABC but also align them with the Digital India vision for a more connected
and efficient educational ecosystem. The insights shared during this will
empower faculty to effectively leverage ABC, support students in their
academic journeys and help administrators optimize institutional credit
management practices.

We trust that this collaboration will greatly benefit our educational
community, ultimately contributing to a more integrated and accessible
learning environment for all.

For any further assistance, Mr. Gaurav Khare may kindly be contacted at
gaurav.khare1@digitalindia.gov.in.

Thank you for your support in encouraging faculty and students to engage in
the future of e-governance and collaborative technology platforms.

In view of the foregoing,  AICTE requests your institution to share this
information with all the faculty, students, staff, and others, so that they
can benefit from it.

--

subject: Syllabus of MSUD101 for MIDTERM Exam
snippet: Dear Students Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024 for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in the Midterm exam conducted in the
content:
Dear Students
Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024
for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in
the Midterm exam conducted in the month of September. The paper style and
Syllabus of the exam is as follows:
Paper Style
05 MCQ +15 Marks Discreptive questions
Syllabus:
Unit 1 : Higher order derivative
Unit 2 : Infinite series *( Infinite series * *only* *and Complex number is
not included in the exam)*
Unit 3 : Matrix
Unit 4: Partial differentiation
BEST OF LUCK ....

If you have any queries, then consult me in the staff room 309, 2nd floor,
Ec Ee building.

*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

subject: Fwd: Invitation to participate in All India Women ONLY Start-a-thon (AIWOS) - a national-level start up competition exclusively for women- reg.
snippet: Dear Girls Students, Greetings for the Day!! Nice opportunity to shine for a start-up. More details are in the trailing mail. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov
content:
Dear Girls Students,

Greetings for the Day!!

Nice opportunity to shine for a start-up. More details are in the trailing
mail.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in>
Date: Thu, 31 Oct, 2024, 11:19‚ÄØam
Subject: Invitation to participate in All India Women ONLY Start-a-thon
(AIWOS) - a national-level start up competition exclusively for women- reg.



Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2024/30-Oct/AICTE/index.html>
------------------------------

Respected Madam/Sir,

*Greetings from AICTE!*

AICTE in collaboration with Shooting Stars Foundation has launched the *All
India Women ONLY Start-a-thon (AIWOS) - a national-level start up
competition exclusively for women!* This is a great opportunity for
entrepreneurially ambitious women to turn their ideas into impactful
ventures. You are encouraged to circulate the details amongst women
students of the below program and urge them to participate in maximum
numbers.

*Key Details:*

   - Registrations: Now Open
   - Eligibility: Women across India (can participate individually or as
   part of a team)
   - Mode: Fully Online
   - There is no registration fee and students will not be required to pay
   any fee at any stage of the program
   - Registration link:
   https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1Ao5Ubh0xGUJFqcvscdjpLdU01nKEUAA7pCUuBKxIH4U
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=769680ef3c574a5d93da237d42fc6e175d7e3844&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>
   - For Questions: aiwos@sstarsfoundation.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=4359d6e7d64444273436de745bffd060e834cc53&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>

*About AIWOS:*

AIWOS is a national level start-up competition exclusively for Women to
spark entrepreneurship interest in women students. We are bringing together
experts and organizations for a 1st of its kind *Women Exclusive Startup
Program* to maximize their learning and career outcomes.

*Women students registering/participating for AIWOS ? *

   - Tailored training programs to enhance employability (Registered
   Students will get details of upcoming webinars)


   - Mentorship from industry leaders and successful entrepreneurs
   - Chance for start-ups to be considered by top angel investors and
   incubators for funding and incubation support
   - Internship/Placement opportunities at top corporates

Kindly motivate women students to take advantage of this opportunity to
accelerate their careers and step towards their entrepreneurial journey!

 PFA:-
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1sWNE6HblCwe1vf3T3QZvXVtFtOmzBdnQ/view?usp=sharing
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=2989eedcbd6de7b1c233fab1ecb73708951fc41c&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>



*With Warm Regards,**Amit Dutta**,*
*(PhD.)*
*Director,*
*Policy & Academic Planning Bureau*
*All India Council for Technical Education,*
*Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj,
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/Nelson+Mandela+Marg,+Vasant+Kunj,+New+Delhi-+110070?entry=gmail&source=g>*
*New Delhi- 110070
<https://www.google.com/maps/search/Nelson+Mandela+Marg,+Vasant+Kunj,+New+Delhi-+110070?entry=gmail&source=g>
*
*Phone no. 011-29581117**Email id - *directorpnap@aicte-india.org
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=778b61d2a69a9b992e90629cb3460fb650818909&lat=2024&mid=b5c2567dc4949bd5ba70e03b8ec45a7aa59cbd6e>
Share it on Social Media [image: social icon]
