subject: Quiz - II of MSUD101 on 22/11/2024(Rewised date)
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google Forms on 21/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. Earlier it was scheduled for 18/11/202. It has been
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Please note that the MSUD101 online quiz II will be conducted on Google
Forms on 21/11/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25. *Earlier it was scheduled for
18/11/202. I**t has been rescheduled for 22/11/2024** due to the Midterm
Exam for late-admitted students.*
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute email ID (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
and Password of account otherwise, you will not be able to take the exam.*

*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 2
Infinite Series*(Only infinite series and complex number is not included)*
Tests of convergence of series viz., comparison test, ratio test, root
test, Leibnitz test

Unit 4 Partial differentiation
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation, Euler‚Äôs theorem with
corollaries and their
applications, Chain rule, Implicit functions, Total differentials

Unit 5 Applications of Partial Differentiations*(Half of the Unit)*
Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series expansion in two variables, Tangent plane
and normal line to a surface, Maxima and Minima of the function of two
variables
*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

subject: [IMPORTANT]IIT CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY ANAND, GUJRAT Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with IIT Roorkee's Cognizance: a 2-
content:
*DEAR STUDENTSOFCHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGYANAND, GUJRAT*

*Warm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *IIT
Roorkee's Cognizance*: a *2-Month Training and Internship Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious companies including *Cisco, Meta
(Facebook), IBM*, and other leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
you get shortlisted you will be getting a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>


* Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after registering.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week at 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*
*HR MANAGER'S TNK*

subject: INFO_STUDENT NOTICE
snippet: Dear First Year Student of Charusat University Congratulations to all who have successfully enrolled in the Industrial Training & Internship Program. We hope you found the Induction Session
content:
Dear First Year Student of
*Charusat University*

*Congratulations to all who have successfully enrolled in the Industrial
Training & Internship Program. We hope you found the Induction Session
valuable.  We are pleased to inform you that, in response to the
overwhelming interest from students, the registration deadline has been
extended until 8:00 PM today. For those who have yet to submit the
application form, please complete it now.*

*Application Deadline: 04:00 PM [29-10-2024]*
*[LAST 10 SLOTS AVAILABLE]*

*  Application Form  *
*https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9 <https://forms.gle/GZsgfg9ggp8wnMpk9>*

*REFERRAL ID: DICE ID (For **Charusat* *Students only)*



*PROGRAM DETAILS*
*- First Month: Training includes live lectures and mentorship from
industry professionals. Login credentials will be provided upon
registration.*

*- Second Month: Internship with live mentorship on projects from
professionals. Experience real-world problems through:*

  *- Project 1:* 10 individual projects to be completed with your mentor.
  *- Project 2:* Capstone Group Project with specific tasks assigned to
each intern.

*Benefits:*

- Program Completion Certificate from IIT Roorkee Cognizance.
- Internship Certificate from Top MNCs with Wipro Dice ID verification.
- 6-month LMS portal access.
- Growth Community pass with placement assistance.
- 24/7 personalized mentorship.
- Complimentary sessions on Gen AI & Prompt Engineering.
- Guidance on Low Code & No Code applications.
- Live & doubt-clearing sessions conducted by industrial experts.
- Guest lectures from Microsoft & Meta.

To enroll in this program, please complete the application form at your
earliest convenience.




*STUDENTS WHO ARE ALREADY ENROLLED, IGNORE THIS MAIL.*
Warm regards,
*Cognizance IIT Roorkee*

subject: Internship Invitation for Charusat 1st year students
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce an AICTE-approved internship program in collaboration with TNK Cognizance IIT Roorkee. Fill out the application below: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to announce an *AICTE-approved internship program* in
collaboration with *TNK Cognizance IIT Roorkee*.

Fill out the application below:
*https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScaz1QYoNayJsy4_mks4K9C6M9GSrEM_2STii2pTLvvd2Qjbw/viewform?usp=sf_link*
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScaz1QYoNayJsy4_mks4K9C6M9GSrEM_2STii2pTLvvd2Qjbw/viewform?usp=sf_link>

*About the Program:*

This program provides a *2-month Training + Internship* program, and we
accept a particular* number of students*.

*Program Overview:*

   - *First Month:* Live lectures delivered by *industry professionals*.
   You will receive login credentials after registration.
   - *Second Month:* Internship with live project mentorship. Gain
   experience solving *real-world problems*.

*Projects:*

   - *Individual Projects:* Each intern will be assigned *10 projects* to
   complete with mentor guidance.
   - *Capstone Project:* A collaborative group project where each intern is
   responsible for specific tasks.

necessary *resources* and *materials* will be provided.

*Learning Options:*

   1. *Blended Program (Recorded Classes):* entrance to recorded sessions
   with weekend *live doubt-clearing sessions*.
   2. *Mentor-Led Program (Live Classes):* *Live classes* via Zoom, *2-3
   days a week* at *6:30 PM*, with visibility to recordings and a *Learning
   Management System (LMS)* for 6 months.

*Upon Completion, You Will Receive:*

   - *Certificate of completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - *Co-branded internship certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *Placement support*.
   - Entry to our *growing professional community*.
   - Hands-on experience with *low-code and no-code tools*.
   - Expertise in *Generative AI* and *Prompt Engineering*.
   - *Exclusive Masterclasses* from industry leaders.
   - *Personalized guidance* throughout the program.

first midterm exam),

subject: CHARUSAT - FMS - IIIM - Invitation @ Prabandhan 2024 (Exhibition cum Sale) - Inaugural Ceremony
snippet: Dear All, Greetings! We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM) is organising PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 from October 25 to 28, 2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM). Prabandhan
content:
Dear All,



Greetings!



We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of
Management (IIIM) is organising *PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 *from October 25 to 28,
2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM).


Prabandhan is a student-driven event in which students work in close
collaboration with industries, entrepreneurs, gruh-udhyog, and SMEs to
understand the product, devise marketing strategies, learn financial
management and negotiation skills, and ultimately sell the product.


You are invited to visit the exhibition with your family, friends, and
relatives to motivate the student participants.




The inaugural ceremony details are as follows:



*Chief Guest: Anitaben Patel & Aartiben Patel (IPCO Parivar)*

*Place: Sardar Patel Banquet Hall, Anand (Opp. D Z Patel High School, 80
Feet Road, Anand)*

*Date: October 25, 2024 (Friday)*

*Timing: 10:00 AM*



*Please find the attached invitation and product poster herewith this mail.*


*Hoping to see you all at Prabandhan 2024 during all the four days of the
event (October 25-28, 2024).*



*Regards,*



*TEAM PRABANDHAN - IIIM*

--

subject: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 (CEHv13) - World‚Äôs No. 1 Ethical Hacking Certification, now with the power of AI (Oct 2024) - For CHARUSAT Students Only
snippet: Dear students, We are glad to inform you that "Charotar University of Science and Technology - CHARUSAT" is the official EC-Council Academia Partner since January 2020. We are immensely
content:
Dear students,

We are glad to inform you that *"Charotar University of Science and
Technology - CHARUSAT"* is the official *EC-Council Academia Partner *since
January 2020. We are immensely pleased to welcome ‚ÄúCHARUSAT‚Äù *students* to
EC Council's newly launched *CEHv13* program. Certified Ethical
Hacker CEHv13
<https://www.eccouncil.org/programs/certified-ethical-hacker-ceh/> will
teach you the latest commercial-grade hacking tools, techniques, and
methodologies hackers and information security professionals use to hack an
organization lawfully. *100+ students have benefited from CEH at CHARUSAT
with a subsidized academia kit price.*

*What‚Äôs new in CEHv13?*: *From the creators of Certified Ethical Hacker
(CEH) comes the latest and evolved version 13 with added AI capabilities.
Structured across 20 learning modules covering over 550 attack techniques,
CEH provides cybersecurity professionals with the core knowledge they need
to detect and defend against emerging threats.*

*You will get:*

   - EC-Council Official Course Book for CEHv13 for self-study (24 Months) -
   Accessible Online/Offline. To Download App
   <https://support.vitalsource.com/hc/en-us/articles/201344733-Bookshelf-Download-Options>

   - Access To iLabs for 6 Months. Check the ilabs Demo Here:
   *https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI* <https://youtu.be/iU_7zKypJZI>.
   - An Exam Voucher (1 Year) - *Get a globally recognized certificate
for* passing
   the exam. Accreditations
   <https://linkprotect.cudasvc.com/url?a=https%3a%2f%2fwww.eccouncil.org%2faccreditations%2f&c=E,1,hLej6Kb3ZRL_QKhhm71kedMm89bbj8UclU3d50zuCt2frG_t19Fir_60SvUk16RJBGYXwVBLF11HLMhr7nDv8WGkPElWNiTm9zdZ_xfo&typo=1>
   - Over 200 hands-on labs with Over 3,500 hacking tools. Learn how to
   hack multiple operating systems (Windows 11, Windows servers, Linux,
   Ubuntu, Android)
   - The venue of the Exam will be our University Premises.

*Popular Cybersecurity Tools in the Course:*


* - Network scanning and mapping tools (e.g., Nmap, hping3)- Vulnerability
assessment tools (e.g., OpenVAS, Nessus)- Penetration testing tools (e.g.,
Metasploit, Aircrack-ng)- Packet sniffers and network analyzers (e.g.,
Wireshark, Omnipeek Network Analyzer)- Social engineering tools (e.g.,
Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET), SpeedPhish Framework (SPF))- Password
cracking tools (e.g., John the Ripper, L0phtCrack)- Forensics tools (e.g.
FTK, EnCase, Autopsy)- Wireless hacking tools (e.g., Aircrack-ng,
Wifiphisher)- Encryption tools (e.g., CryptoForge, VeraCrypt)*
*Master AI to automate ethical hacking tasks and hack and defend against AI
systems.*

*‚Ä¢ ShellGPT* ‚Äì Automates various reconnaissance and penetration testing
tasks using AI-driven scripting.
*‚Ä¢ ChatGPT *‚Äì Helps generate code, automate tasks, and create scripts for
ethical hacking.
‚Ä¢ *FraudGPT* ‚Äì Simulates AI-assisted malicious activities to learn defense
strategies.
‚Ä¢ *WormGPT* ‚Äì An offensive AI tool used to simulate exploitations and
malware creation.
‚Ä¢ *DeepExploit* ‚Äì AI-powered vulnerability scanning and exploitation tool.
‚Ä¢ *Nebula* ‚Äì Automates network discovery and vulnerability identification
with AI.
‚Ä¢ *Veed.io* ‚Äì Can visualize security analytics and post-exploitation
results for better reporting.


*Typical Job Roles for C|EH :*

   - Mid-Level Information Security Auditor
   - Cybersecurity Auditor
   - Security Administrator
   - IT Security Administrator
   - Cyber Defense Analyst
   - Senior Security Consultant
   - Information Security Manager
   - Senior SOC Analyst
   - Solution Architect
   - Cybersecurity Consultant



   - Vulnerability Assessment Analyst
   - Warning Analyst
   - Information Security Analyst 1
   - Security Analyst L1
   - Infosec Security Administrator
   - Cybersecurity Analyst L1, L2, & L3
   - Network Security Engineer
   - SOC Security Analyst
   - Security Analyst
   - Network Engineer

subject: CHARUSAT Team Selection for All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for
the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University
Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a prestigious platform where you
can showcase your talents and represent our university on a national level.

*Benefits of Participation:*

- Recognition and Exposure: Gain visibility and recognition for your
talents.

- Skill Development: Enhance your leadership, teamwork, and creative skills.

- National-Level Opportunities: The chance to represent CHARUSAT at
national youth festivals.

- Networking: Build connections with peers across universities.

*Important Details:*

*- Registration Form: *https://forms.gle/C1VFdPTgfucvzUHKA

*- Deadline for Registration:* 1st November, 2024

*- Guidelines, Rules, and Regulations*: Please review the attached
documents carefully for event details and required documents.

We encourage all students to take advantage of this opportunity to grow and
make CHARUSAT proud. For any queries, feel free to contact us.

--

snippet: Dear students, Here is an opportunity to explore in depth information , tools and techniques for getting admissions in top class B-schools of India for MBA and allied courses. The resource person is Dr
content:
Dear students,

Here is an opportunity to explore in depth information , tools and
techniques for getting admissions in top class B-schools of India for MBA
and allied courses.

The resource person is Dr. Darshan Pandya from one of the leading
institutes, School of Business Management, NMIMS University, Mumbai. He is
also an alumni of CHARUSAT. So it's a great chance to interact with him for
getting proper and crystal clear information from him to clear competitive
examinations for getting admission in top Business schools of India.

Fill the form to register for the webinar via
https://forms.gle/1axWRhSVZUDEbgfE6 link.

subject: Working model exhibition group no with the list of students in each group
snippet: Dear all, Attached is the group number for the working model exhibition. Please be seated by 1:45 PM. Your group number is written in small handwriting on the bench in the corner, and you can take your
content:
Dear all,

Attached is the group number for the working model exhibition. Please be
seated by 1:45 PM. Your group number is written in small handwriting on the
bench in the corner, and you can take your seat accordingly. Please bring a
hard copy of your project report and keep it handy during the exhibition.

Also prepare an A4 sized paper indicating your group number and project
name and display it on the table (Do not stick the paper on wall or bench)
for easy reference by visitors and judges.


One

Thanks and Regards,
-
*Pinal Patel*
*M.E. (Structural Engineering)*

*Assistant Professor,**M.S. Patel Department of civil engineering,*
*Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Changa-388421,*

*Gujarat*
*Ext No: 5090*

subject: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students
snippet: Dear Students, About Foundation Course: Foundation Course in Math and Physics, which is a mandatory audit course for all 1st semester BTech students. This course is designed to bridge the gap between
content:
Dear Students,

*About Foundation Course: *
Foundation Course in Math and Physics, which is a *mandatory audit course*
for all *1st semester BTech students*. This course is designed to bridge
the gap between high school and university-level concepts, focusing on
fundamental topics such as calculus, algebra, mechanics, electromagnetism,
etc. The aim is to build a strong foundation for your advanced engineering
studies.


*Course Evaluation:*>> Internal Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(Date: 19/10/2024 |
3:00 PM to 3:30 PM) (Link will be provided before 05 mins of the quiz time)*
>> External Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(to be announced later with the external
theory exam)*
>> Total: *50 Marks*
>> Both quizzes will be conducted *online (Google Forms)*.
>> Questions in both quizzes will be asked from the question banks attached
with this email.


*Important Note:*
*1) No excuse for internet connectivity, device failure, etc will be
entertained. If you failed to attend the quiz then you shall be marked
absent.*
*2) This is a separate course that has to do nothing with your
ongoing Engineering Physics and Engineering Mathematics courses.*

*Attachments*
1) Syllabus of Foundation Course
2) Question Bank of Physics and Mathematics

For any queries, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Sanni
-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D
Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,CHARUSAT
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/>, Changa. - 388 421, India*

*Email: sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>*
*            sunkapatel@gmail.com <sunkapatel@gmail.com>*
*Phone: (M) +91 - 9978577009*

subject: Announcement of ULSC Logo Competition Winner
snippet: Dear Students and Faculty, We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition! After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we are pleased to congratulate
content:
Dear Students and Faculty,

We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition!

After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we
are pleased to congratulate *Satyam Charola (ID: 22CE016)* as the winner of
this competition. His design will represent the ULSC, and we appreciate the
effort and creativity he put into the logo.

Satyam was awarded with a cash prize for his achievement.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to all participants for their outstanding
contributions and enthusiasm. Stay tuned for more such opportunities!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: Fwd: Mandatory Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz for All BTech Students
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that a mandatory quiz -1 on Engineering Physics - 1 will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from your syllabus and is essential for your
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that a mandatory quiz -1 on Engineering Physics - 1
will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from
your syllabus and is essential for your continuous evaluation.

*Quiz Details:*
Quiz 1
Syllabus: Experiments 1 to 5 (Basic concepts, Experimental Process, etc)
Date: 19/10/2024
Time: 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM
Venue: Online (Google Form) (Link will be provided before 5 mins of Exam)
Format: Multiple-choice questions (MCQs)

Please ensure your participation as this is a compulsory part of the
assessment process. No excuses for internet connectivity, technical issues
with devices, etc. will be entertained. No marks will be given if fail to
attend this quiz.

For any further information, feel free to reach out by replying to this
email.

Best regards,
Sanni

-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D
Patel Institute of Applied Sciences,CHARUSAT
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/>, Changa. - 388 421, India*

subject: Mandatory Engineering Physics - 1 Quiz for All BTech Students
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that a mandatory quiz -1 on Engineering Physics - 1 will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from your syllabus and is essential for your
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that a mandatory quiz -1 on Engineering Physics - 1
will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from
your syllabus and is essential for your continuous evaluation.

*Quiz Details:*
Quiz 1
Syllabus: Experiments 1 to 5 (Basic concepts, Experimental Process, etc)
Date: 19/10/2024
Time: 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM
Venue: Online (Google Form) (Link will be provided before 5 mins of Exam)
Format: Multiple-choice questions (MCQs)

Please ensure your participation as this is a compulsory part of the
assessment process. No excuses for internet connectivity, technical issues
with devices, etc. will be entertained. No marks will be given if fail to
attend this quiz.

For any further information, feel free to reach out by replying to this
email.

Best regards,
Sanni

--

subject: Invitation : Working Model Exhibition on 18/10/2024 by 1st year CL/ME/EE students from 2:00 to 4:00
snippet: Dear all, MS Patel Department of Civil Engineering at CSPIT, CHARUSAT, invites you to an exhibition of working models based on the principles of Engineering Mechanics (CLUC102) for first-year students
content:
Dear all,

M. S. Patel Department of Civil Engineering at CSPIT, CHARUSAT, invites you
to an exhibition of working models based on the principles of Engineering
Mechanics (CLUC102) for first-year students in Civil, Mechanical, and
Electrical Engineering.



The event will improve first-year civil, mechanical, and electrical
engineering students' teamwork, confidence, and presentation skills.
Approximately 46 models will be created by these students, with each group
displaying their model and explaining its function and underlying
principles to visitors.



The  event details are as follows:

¬∑       *Date:* 18th October 2024 ; *Time:* 2:00 pm to 04:00 pm

¬∑       *Venue:* Central Square and Lobby from GT lab to CT lab, A7
Building, Ground floor



The flow of the exhibition will be as follows:

¬∑       Students will showcase their working model to visitors from 2:00 PM
to 4:00 PM.



*I kindly ask that you take a moment out of your undoubtedly busy schedules
to offer your encouragement and support to the students as they embark on
their very first attempt. Your words of motivation will mean a great deal
to them and can greatly influence their confidence in this important
endeavor.*

Thanks and Regards,
-

*M.E. (Structural Engineering)*

subject: Seeking Interns: Apply for a Professional Experience with an AICTE Internship to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT *Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

subject: MYSY Scholarship Criteria
snippet: Dear Students!! Greetings!! Hope you are doing well. As you may know, 75% attendance is mandatory to qualify for the Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana (MYSY) scholarship. If the candidate does not
content:
Dear Students!!
Greetings!!
Hope you are doing well.
As you may know, 75% attendance is mandatory to qualify for the
Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana (*MYSY) *scholarship. If the candidate
does not meet the criteria, the institute may not be able to process the
scholarship. The candidate shall be asked to justify such instance and the
institute shall have sole discretion for consideration of justification.

The remaining 25% may be spared for leaves viz. medical issues, family
events, festivals etc. However, it is strongly recommended that more than
80% of attendance be maintained in both classrooms and laboratories.

All the best,
Trushit Upadhyaya

-- 
Professor & I/c Principal
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology
Faculty of Technology & Engineering
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
CHARUSAT Campus, Changa, 388421
Petlad, Anand
Gujarat, India.

--

snippet: Dear Student of Civil and Mechanical (24ME060 onwards seated in Civil Class) Pls note that the submission of the Assignment is on tomorrow at 11:15 in room 310. You are informed to submit assignments
content:
Dear Student of Civil and Mechanical (24ME060 onwards seated in Civil Class)
Pls note that the submission of the Assignment is on tomorrow at 11:15 in
room 310.  You are informed to submit assignments for Unit 1 and Unit 3 on
tomorrow.
If you remain, absent then I will put 00 marks in place of 04 Marks(02+02).
Late submission is not allowed.

The surprise test is on Friday at 09:10 in my regular lecture for 10 marks.
The syllabus is as follows :
Unit 1, Unit 3, Unit 4, Unit 2(Upto geometric series)
If you remain absent in the surprise test, then I will put 00 marks and
retest will not be done for it.

content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Kindly note that the link to the quiz -1 is as follows. You must have your
CHARUSAT Mail ID to appear in quiz-1.
 If you have any queries, consult me in the staff room 309 Ec-Ee building,
CSPIT.
If you cannot access the quiz through your phone, sign out all Gmail
accounts from your device and then sign in CHARUSAT mail ID. After this,
you can appear in the quiz.

me in the staff room at 11:10 AM. I will make other arrangements for such
students.*

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT *Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

*Advaya*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*advaya.pathak@teachnook.com <advaya.pathak@teachnook.com>*

subject: Quiz - I of MSUD101 on 07/10/2024
snippet: Dear Students Good Morning Kindly note that the online quiz of MSUD101 will be conducted on 07/10/2024 between 11:15 and 11:25 on Google Forms. The link will be shared on your institute mail ID. Make
content:
Dear Students
Good Morning
Kindly note that the online quiz of MSUD101 will be conducted on 07/10/2024
between 11:15 and 11:25 on Google Forms.
The link will be shared on your institute mail ID.
*Make sure you have your institute mail id (________@charusat.edu.in
<https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=________%40charusat.edu.in&authuser=0>)
otherwise, you will not be able to give the exam.*
*Syllabus of the exam : *
Unit 1
Lagrange‚Äôs Mean Value Theorem, Local Maxima and Minima of the function of
one variable
Successive differentiation: nth derivative of elementary functions:
rational, logarithmic, trigonometric, exponential and hyperbolic
Leibnitz rule for the nth-order derivatives of the product of two functions
Power series expansion of a function: Maclaurin‚Äôs and Taylor‚Äôs series
expansion.
L‚ÄôHospital‚Äôs rule and related applications, Indeterminate forms

Unit 3
Definition of Matrix, types of matrices and their properties
Determinant and their properties
Rank and nullity of a matrix
Determination of rank
Solution of a system of linear equations by Gauss elimination and Gauss
Jordan Methods


Unit 4
Partial derivative and geometrical interpretation

*BEST OF LUCK*

*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

--

subject: Online Meeting regarding ABC-ID for First Year(2024 admitted) students
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Students, You might know that the Government of India has initiated National Education Policy 2020 (NEP-2020). One of the important points under the policy, applicable to higher education
content:
Dear CHARUSAT Students,

You might know that the Government of India has initiated *National
Education Policy 2020 (NEP-2020)*. One of the important points under the
policy, applicable to higher education, is to provide a  *CREDIT transfer
facility* through *ABC-ID*(Academic Bank of Credits-ID).

In line with the above-mentioned subject, you all are requested to *create
the ABC-ID* (IF you havn't created yet) from the below-given website. The
details of the need for ABC-ID and its benefits are mentioned in the
presentation as available in the link below. please go through the
presentation for a detailed understanding of the same.

*Kindly find the attachment regarding different ways to create ABC-ID.*

*Link of ABC-ID Presentation manual*:
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vokIiR3YRPeU_4qNAxa3cosi9lHFewm5HBUxfJA-IQw/preview?slide=
id.p
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Regarding ABC ID*
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps to create ABC id is:

step-1: create abc id from: https://www.abc.gov.in/
step-2: Select student as shown below:

[image: image.png]

*The online meeting to solve doubts/queries (If any) regarding the ABC-ID
is scheduled as per below:*

Date:  07/10/2024, Monday
Time: 11.10 am
Meeting Link: Meeting link will be shared soon [Microsoft Team]




-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

--

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT. Teachnook is conducting an AICTE APPROVED Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP. Register before Slots get
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT.*

Teachnook is conducting an *AICTE APPROVED* Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly
go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP.
Register before Slots get filled.



*Greetings!*

*We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with top Notch
MNCs to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This
advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need
to enhance your career.*

 We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS* in the program.



*It is Mandatory for Interested students to fill out the form, if you get
shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team:GOOGLE
FORM: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*

*To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month:* Training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
No Prerequisites Required.

*Second month: *Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  *Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a
group of 10-12 interns. For each intern, a particular work will be assigned
to them, and they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)

*Here are two types of Sessions we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded Sessions: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live Sessions: *You will be having live Zoom classes after 7
PM for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
*LMS(Learning Management System)* portal which you will have access to for
6 months.

After Completion of the program, the student shall receive :


[image: ‚úÖ] Program completion certificate issued by MNCs and Verified By
Wipro DICE ID.

[image: ‚úÖ] Co-Branded Internship certificate from Top MNCs.

[image: ‚úÖ] Get certified by CISCO, META, IBM, and Microsoft Certified
Fundamentals.

[image: ‚úÖ] 100% Placement Assistance.

[image: ‚úÖ] Access to a growing community.


*Shashi*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*shashidhara.d@teachnook.com <shashidhara.d@teachnook.com>*

subject: Fwd: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Admin ME <admin.me@charusat.edu.in> Date: Thu, Sep 26, 2024 at 5:52 PM Subject: Fwd: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs To:
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Admin ME <admin.me@charusat.edu.in>
Date: Thu, Sep 26, 2024 at 5:52‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
To: sagarchokshi.me@charusat.ac.in <sagarchokshi.me@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Ritesh Bhatt <riteshbhatt.win@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Sep 19, 2024 at 1:11‚ÄØPM
Subject: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
To: <family@charusat.edu.in>


Dear New Students...

To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps:

1:-   open URL http://egov.charusat  (Open URL within campus only)
2:-   Login with your egovernance ID and Password
3:-   Top left cornet (3 horizontal bar) go to settings
4:-   Select "Internet WiFi password change"
5:-   You may set a strong password for your internet access. With the help
of your student ID and Wi-Fi password, you can access the internet from
permitted computer labs and on your laptop. (WiFI on mobile is restricted)

To access WiFi from Laptop, connect to either CHARUSAT WiFi or WINCell SSID
with password "charusat"

You may also get a better idea with the attached video.

*Best Regards*


*Ritesh Bhatt *Head Datacenter, WIN-Cell
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
Accredited *Grade 'A+'* by NAAC

At. Changa 388 421, Ta. Petlad,
Dist. Anand
O: +912697-265106 / 07

subject: Fwd: Postponement of the celebration of Vrund '24 to Monday - September 30, 2024
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Convener ECC <convener.ecc@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, 27 Sept, 2024, 12:23 pm Subject: Postponement of the celebration of Vrund '24 to Monday -
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Convener ECC <convener.ecc@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, 27 Sept, 2024, 12:23‚ÄØpm
Subject: Postponement of the celebration of Vrund '24 to Monday - September
30, 2024
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,

Please note that looking at the weather forecasts and safety - security of
the students particularly those commuting, celebration of Vrund '24 has
been postponed to September 30, 2024.

All other details and schedule for Vrund '24 remain intact for Monday -
September 30, 2024.

Please inform the staff, students and invitees of your Department /
Institute / Family accordingly.

Inconvenience is highly regretted.

Thanking you in anticipation of your cooperation,

With regards,

Team ULSC

--

subject: Blood Donation Camp on 30/09/2024
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family, We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our community. CHRF and NSS units of
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Family,*

We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special
event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our
community. CHRF and NSS units of CHARUSAT, BDIPS, ARIP and MTIN
have organized a Blood donation camp in collaboration with the Lions Club
of Nadiad Mains, and Indian Red Cross Society. We invite each one of you to
participate and contribute to this noble cause.

Blood Donation Camp details are as under:



*Date: 30/09/2024*

*Time: 09:30 am to 3:30 pm*

*Location: Physiotherapy Department, Ground floor, CHRF, CHARUSAT *



Let's come together as a university community and make
this Blood Donation Camp a resounding success. Your contribution can truly
make a life-saving difference.

If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to
contact the NSS Department.

Thank you for your willingness to participate, we are looking forward to
seeing you at the Blood Donation Camp!

Link for registration into Blood Donation Camp: *(Fill this out on or
before 27/09/2024)*


https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd_asjz8lC4zZHjVyxqu8PSZdZhPSnsSu0RJpj7wDmdhFlEzg/viewform?usp=sf_link



*Kishan Patel*

*NSS Program Coordinator *

*Charusat NSS Cell*

--

subject: Training and Internship Opportunities to Kick Start Your Journey with Top Notch MNC's
snippet: Dear Students of CHARUSAT. Teachnook is conducting an AICTE APPROVED Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP. Register before Slots get
content:
*Dear Students of CHARUSAT.*

Teachnook is conducting an *AICTE APPROVED* Internship for STUDENTS, Kindly
go through this and join the group as well as fill out the form also ASAP.
Register before Slots get filled.



*Greetings!*

*We are pleased to share that our company is collaborating with top Notch
MNCs to offer a unique 2-month Training + Internship  Program. This
advanced program will provide you with the practical skills that you need
to enhance your career.*

 We are enrolling only *LIMITED STUDENTS* in the program.



*It is Mandatory for Interested students to fill out the form, if you get
shortlisted you will get a call from our HR Team:GOOGLE
FORM: https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>*


*To know more information join in WhatsApp group:*

*https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq>*


*FIND THE BELOW ATTACHMENTS FOR REFERENCE:*

*First month:* Training has been designed in the form of Live lectures
along with living mentorship from industry professionals. (Login
credentials will be provided to students after registration)
No Prerequisites Required.

*Second month: *Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT will give students experience in
solving real-world problems.

*Project 1:- *10 individual projects are assigned to each intern, which
they must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:-  *Capstone Project: It's a group project assigned to a
group of 10-12 interns. For each intern, a particular work will be assigned
to them, and they have to work on it.
(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by

*Here are two types of Sessions we are providing:*

*1. Blended Program/Recorded Sessions: *You will receive recorded sessions,
whatever doubts you have you can clear them in live doubt-clearing sessions
which will be organized every weekend.

*2. Mentor-led/Live Sessions: *You will be having live Zoom classes after 7
PM for 2 to 3 days a week. You will get your recorded sessions as well
*LMS(Learning Management System)* portal which you will have access to for

subject: Apply for Start-up Gujarat Seed Fund (30 Lakhs-40 Lakhs) via CIVF
snippet: Dear Start-up, As you know CIVF (CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation)- a section-8 company of Charusat University has been officially recognized as a Nodal Institute by the Industries
content:
Dear Start-up,
As you know CIVF (CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation)- a section-8
company of Charusat University has been officially recognized as a *Nodal
Institute* by the *Industries Commissionerate, Govt. of Gujarat*. We invite
you to apply for a seed grant to fuel your growth and innovation. Don't
miss this opportunity to accelerate your startup journey! (Find the scheme
document as *Ann-1*)

As a Nodal Institute, CIVF can now offer the following support:

   - Assistance up to *INR 30 lakh* as a *seed support* to the startups.
   - Sustenance allowance of *INR 20,000 per month *to the startups and *INR
   25,000 per month* to *women-led startups* for a period of one year.
   - Additional assistance up to *INR 10 lakh *for the startups generating
   significant impact on the society. Thus seed support extends to up to INR
   40 lakhs.
   - Assistance up to *INR 1 lakh* per startup for obtaining* training in
   soft skills *on a reimbursement basis.
   - Assistance up to *INR 3 lakh* to enroll and participate in
   national/international recognized *acceleration programs.*
   - Additional 1% Interest Subsidy, maximum up to* 9% on term loans* to
   applicants under the scheme's provisions for assistance to MSMEs.

The application process is as Under:

1. Read the eligibility criteria of the scheme. (Product/service should be
innovative, Company should be registered and the Start-up should be based
in Gujarat) *(*Refer to detailed eligibility criteria in* Ann-2)*

2. Fill out the form based on the benefit you want to avail. (Find all
applicable forms in the attachment as *Ann-3, Ann-4, Ann-5 & Ann-6. *Take
the pdf content of the application form in Word, enter the details in soft
copy, take print and sign and stamp on hard copy and send the original file
at CIVF- 209, IIIM)

2. Pitch deck presentation in front of CIVF Internal Committee.

3. CIVF will recommend the selected start-ups to Industries Commissionerate
for seed grant or other benefits.

4. If approved at the SLEC committee of  *Industries Commissionerate*, the
grant will be given to NI (i.e. CIVF) and be disbursed to start-up in
tranches based on your milestones.

All the Very Best and Feel free to seek further information.

*Deadline: 01/10/2024 till 12:30 PM*

Note: "Please share the above information with eligible start-up founders
to ensure that the deserving candidates can benefit from the government
scheme."
*Regards,*

*Dr. Swati Joshi, *
*Senior Executive Officer (SEO), *
*CHARUSAT Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF), **209, IIIM,*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT) *
*CHANGA - 388 421 *
*GUJARAT - INDIA *

*Contact no.: +91- 7383491911*
*E-mail: seo@civf.co.in <http://seo@civf.co.in/swatijoshi@civf.co.in>*

--

subject: AICTE Approved Internship to Get Certified by CISCO, META, IBM to Kick Start your Journey.
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*


*Warisha*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*warisha.nouman@teachnook.com <warisha.nouman@teachnook.com>*

subject: Re: CSPIT 2024 State Quota (ACPC) Admission : MYSY Documents Submission / Verification
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, Please ignore the earlier email. All students are requested to submit MYSY for the students admitted in the year 2024 under STATE QUOTA at CSPIT ADMIN OFFICE ‚Äì Room No 101 rather
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

Please ignore the earlier email.

All students are requested to submit MYSY  for the students admitted in the
year 2024 *under STATE QUOTA* at *CSPIT** ADMIN
OFFICE  ‚Äì Room No 101 rather than 102A.*


On Sat, Sep 21, 2024 at 4:17‚ÄØPM Yatin Talati <yatintalati.lib@charusat.ac.in>
wrote:

> Dear CSPIT Students,
>
> As per trailing email, all students are requested to submit MYSY documents submission / verification for
> Renewal and Delayed (students admitted in the year 2021, 2022 and 2023) at
> *CSPIT** ADMIN OFFICE  ‚Äì Room No 101 rather than 102A.*
>
> On Wed, Sep 18, 2024 at 9:26‚ÄØAM Yatin Talati <
> yatintalati.lib@charusat.ac.in> wrote:
>
>> Dear CSPIT Students,
>>
>> We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission /
>> verification start for the students admitted in the year 2024 *under
>> STATE QUOTA at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì UIIC office, Room No 102A.*
>>
>> *For fresh students admitted in the year 2024 under Management Quota OR
>> Vacant Quota will be intimated soon.*
>>
>>  *Please take a note of the following points before submitting
>> the documents:*
>>
>> A.  Lock the Application and take printout of form. *P**rint out of
>> Application form from the WhatsApp image is not acceptable. *
>>
>> B.  All uploaded scan documents *must be clearly visible**.*
>>
>> C.  Submit the application form with photocopies of all uploaded
>> documents *(except IT Form). *
>>
>> D. Please upload a fee receipt which contains *Revenue Stamp and sign by
>> the Account Section of CHARUSAT. *
>>
>> E. Students must write *Enrolment Number (ID No.) in the MYSY form. *
>>
>> F. Upload Sahay renewal certificate *(Will get through your e governance
>> login) *from head of institute *in original with sign of Principal Sir
>> (Not blank). *
>>
>> *G. **Write barcode ID at the top of the form* which will help us to
>> retrieve the data immediately.
>>
>> *Special Note:*
>>
>> 1.      Students are requested to *just drop the application in the tray
>> placed at UIIC office.*
>>
>> 2.      To save time, *there is no need to stay at UIIC office, timely
>> appropriate action will be taken by us.*
>>
>> 3.      University shall remain closed from 25th October 2024 (Friday)
>> to 5th November 2024 (Tuesday) during the Diwali Festival.
>>
>>
>>       *REFER MYSY SITE FOR MORE INFO. (**http://mysy.guj.nic.in
>> <http://mysy.guj.nic.in/>**)*

snippet: Dear Student of Charotar University of Science and Technology, We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for the AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
content:
Dear Student of* Charotar University of Science and Technology*,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been *shortlisted* for the
AICTE-approved Internship Program offered in collaboration with
Cognizance, *IIT
Roorkee*. This opportunity is for the *October-November Batch*, and we
encourage you to secure your spot as soon as possible, as this is the* Final
batch allocated for your university*.

*Program Overview*
The program is a comprehensive *2-month Training + Internship* designed to
provide hands-on experience and professional mentorship. It is open to all
departments, though availability is limited.

*Application Deadline: 21/09/2024, till 11.59 PM (Final 10 Slots Remaining)*
*Click here to apply* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37>

*Program Structure*

   -

   *First Month:*
   Training includes live lectures and mentorship from industry
   professionals. Upon registration, you will receive login credentials to
   access the learning platform.
   - *Project 1:* Complete 10 individual projects under the supervision of
      your mentor.
   -

   *Second Month:*
   A fully mentored internship focusing on real-world projects with
   guidance from professionals:
   - *Project 2:* Engage in a Capstone Group Project with specific roles
      assigned to each intern.

*Program Benefits*

   - Certificate of Completion verified by DICE ID powered by WIPRO and *IIT
   Roorkee Cognizance*.
   - Internship Certificate from top MNCs with *Wipro Dice ID verification*.
   - 6-month access to the *Learning Management System (LMS)*.
   - Membership to the *Growth Community* with placement assistance.
   - 24/7 personalized mentorship.
   - Complimentary sessions on *Generative AI & Prompt Engineering*.
   - Guidance on *Low Code & No Code applications*.
   - Live doubt-clearing sessions with industry experts.
   - Guest lectures featuring professionals from *Microsoft & Meta*.

To secure your participation in this prestigious program, kindly complete
the *application form* at your earliest convenience.

*Apply Now* <https://forms.gle/g9FSBC8THfCWzQW37> ‚Äì *Last 10 slots
available!*

Please note: *If you have already enrolled, you may disregard this email.*

We look forward to your participation in this exciting opportunity.

Warm regards,
*Teachnook*
In Collaboration with *IIT Roorkee Cognizance*

subject: Training and Internship Opportunities to Kick Start Your Journey with Top-Notch MNC's
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Student, Applause for being shortlisted for the internship program! As mentioned above, Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE (Cognizance) is organizing a 2-month training
content:
Dear *CHARUSAT* Student, *Applause for being shortlisted for the internship
program!*

As mentioned above, *Teachnook in collaboration with MNC & IIT ROORKEE
(Cognizance)* is organizing a  2-month training + Internship program
designed by the Mentors of MNCs.

*Interested students can Apply If you're selected for the shortlist, our HR
team will contact you;*

*Apply Here  üëâ*   *https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6*
<https://forms.gle/WsnTxKdcRwpD8ZXw6>

*Join Our Official WhatsApp Group For More Information;*

 https://chat.whatsapp.com/K43ThNxKpaXAfLfHio5hRq









*Top Preferred Courses:‚úÖ Artificial Intelligence.‚úÖ Data Science.‚úÖ Machine
Learning.‚úÖ Cloud Computing.‚úÖ Full Stack Web Development.Below is an
overview of the program's structure.*

*First month:* During the first month of the program, training will be
conducted in the mode of live lectures, and you will have live mentorship
from industry professionals. You will be provided admittance to your
personal *LMS portal* where you can interact with the trainers and fellow
students. Login credentials will be provided to registered students.

*Second month:* Internship with live mentorship for projects from
professionals. *The LIVE INDUSTRY PROJECT* will give students an experience
in solving real-world problems.

*10+ Minor Project: *The minor project is an individual project, Where
students will be doing projects on each topic they will be learning.

*Major Project (CAPSTONE):* The major project is a group project, and you
will work in a group of 3-4 interns, with specific responsibilities
assigned to each intern. The company will provide you with the required
data and materials for the project.

*Third month:* Based on your enactment during the first two months of the
program, we will conduct a technical interview in the same company during
the third month. You will be offered a stipend-based Internship if you
perform well in the interview.





*After Completion of the program, the student shall receive a :‚úÖ Program
completion certificate issued by IIT-ROORKEE Cognizance.‚úÖ The WIPRO Dice ID
verified the co-branded internship certificate.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation
from the Company.‚úÖ Admittance to a growth community.*

*Advaya*
*Key Account Manager*
*9364102817*
*advaya.pathak@teachnook.com <advaya.pathak@teachnook.com>*

subject: Internship Opportunity: Adorebits - Internship Opportunities EUCC Malta Country Tech Development Partner
snippet: Dear Students, There is a work-from-home internship opportunity specifically for those who want to be entrepreneurs or further study abroad. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Adore Bits <
content:
*Dear Students,*
*There is a work-from-home internship opportunity specifically for those
who want to be entrepreneurs or further study abroad.*

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Adore Bits <contact@adorebits.com>
Date: Thu, Sep 19, 2024 at 2:29‚ÄØPM
Subject: EUCC Malta Country Tech Development Partner - Adorebits -
Internship Opportunities
To: niravbhattit <niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in>


üåü *Kickstart Your Career with Adorebits Technology Internship!* üåü

Are you ready to dive into the world of cutting-edge technology and
real-world business development? üöÄ Join Adorebits Technology, where
innovation meets opportunity!

Recognized as one of India‚Äôs Fastest Growing Hot 100 Innovative Technology
Companies and a technical partner of global names like the Chartered
Institute of Marketing, UK and EUCC - Malta Country, Adorebits is your
gateway to the future. With over 9 years of expertise in Blockchain, AI/ML,
and more, we‚Äôre reshaping industries‚Äîand now, we want YOU to be part of
this exciting journey!

üéØ *Why Choose Adorebits Technology?*

1. *Real-World Learning*: Gain hands-on experience in live international
projects, working with the latest in *Business Development*, Brand
Management, Digital Marketing, and more.
2. *Work from Anywhere*: Enjoy the flexibility of a *remote internship*,
fitting work into your schedule wherever you are.
3. *Expert Mentorship*: Learn from seasoned professionals featured in
*Economic Times and Yourstory*.
4. *People-Centric Culture*: Thrive in a collaborative, intern-friendly
environment where your voice matters!
5. *5 Days a Week Culture*: Embrace a balanced workweek with weekends off.
6. *Work-Life Balance*: Benefit from a supportive environment that values
your personal well-being.
7. *Flexible Working Time*: Adapt your working hours to fit your schedule.
8. *Live Client Work Exposure*: Gain real-world experience by working
directly with clients on impactful projects.

üí° *What You‚Äôll Learn*:
- Gain practical experience in Business Development, Brand Management,
Digital Marketing, and more.
- Tackle real-world challenges and solutions in a global tech company.

üíº *An Unpaid, Yet Priceless Experience*:
While the internship is unpaid, the quality of learning and global exposure
is invaluable. You‚Äôll build a portfolio of live, impactful projects,
setting yourself apart in the competitive tech world. On successful
completion of the internship, a certificate will be awarded.

If you‚Äôre passionate about tech, innovation, and growth, this is your
chance to stand out!

üîó *Apply Now*: https://forms.gle/aausA1rGeEtMiTio7

Let‚Äôs spread the word! Share this opportunity with your network and help
connect enthusiastic candidates with a future in tech! For queries, reach
out at contact@adorebits.com.

üåç Adorebits ‚Äì Where Innovation and Opportunity Meet!

-
Regards
HR Team
Adorebits Technology











-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

subject: Fwd: Midterm exam syllabus for MEUC101 Engineering Graphics
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dr. Sagar Chokshi <sagarchokshi.me@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, 19 Sept, 2024, 2:18 pm Subject: Midterm exam syllabus for MEUC101 Engineering Graphics
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr. Sagar Chokshi <sagarchokshi.me@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, 19 Sept, 2024, 2:18‚ÄØpm
Subject: Midterm exam syllabus for MEUC101 Engineering Graphics
To: <23me@charusat.edu.in>, <23cl@charusat.edu.in>, <23ee@charusat.edu.in>,
Dean FTE CHARUSAT <dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Viral Panara <viralpanara.me@charusat.ac.in>, Axat Patel <
axatpatel.me@charusat.ac.in>


1. Fundamentals of Engineering Drawing
1.1 Importance of engineering drawing, drawing instruments and materials,
BIS and ISO
1.2 Different types of lines used in engineering practice, methods of
projections as per SP 46-1988.
1.3 Engineering scale.
Lab 4 topics: title block, types of lines, geometric const. & dimensioning
system
2.Projections of Points and Lines
3.Projections of Planes
5.Orthographic Projection

---
With Regards,

Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology

subject: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
snippet: Dear New Students... To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps: 1:- open URL http://egov.charusat (Open URL within campus only) 2:- Login with your egovernance ID and Password 3:-
content:
Dear New Students...

To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps:

1:-   open URL http://egov.charusat  (Open URL within campus only)
2:-   Login with your egovernance ID and Password
3:-   Top left cornet (3 horizontal bar) go to settings
4:-   Select "Internet WiFi password change"
5:-   You may set a strong password for your internet access. With the help
of your student ID and Wi-Fi password, you can access the internet from
permitted computer labs and on your laptop. (WiFI on mobile is restricted)

To access WiFi from Laptop, connect to either CHARUSAT WiFi or WINCell SSID
with password "charusat"

You may also get a better idea with the attached video.

*Best Regards*


*Ritesh Bhatt *Head Datacenter, WIN-Cell
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
Accredited *Grade 'A+'* by NAAC

At. Changa 388 421, Ta. Petlad,
Dist. Anand
O: +912697-265106 / 07

subject: Supercharge Your Career with IEEE ‚Äì Student Branch Recruitment Open!!
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, We're excited to invite you to join the IEEE CSPIT Student Branch 2024-25, a platform designed to help you grow both academically and professionally. Whether you're looking
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

We‚Äôre excited to invite you to join the *IEEE CSPIT Student Branch* 2024-25,
a platform designed to help you grow both *academically* and
*professionally*. Whether you're looking to gain hands-on experience, build
your resume, or expand your network, IEEE has something for you!

*What is IEEE?*

IEEE is the world‚Äôs largest technical professional organization. Our
Student Branches are university-based groups that offer opportunities for
career development, technical learning, leadership experience, and
networking within fields of engineering and related disciplines.
Why Join the IEEE Student Branch?

   1.

   *Build Your Resume with Projects and Skills*
   Participate in technical projects, workshops, and hackathons that
   provide *real-world experience* in areas like AI, Robotics, and Software
   Development. These projects will help you showcase your skills to future
   employers.
   2.

   *Exclusive Networking Opportunities*
   Connect with *industry professionals*, *mentors*, and peers from around
   the world. These connections can open doors for internships, jobs, and
   career advice.
   3.

   *Leadership Experience*
   Take on leadership roles within the branch to develop your *management,
   team-building*, and *communication skills*‚Äîall valuable assets for your
   resume.
   4.

   *Access to Global Competitions and Events*
   Participate in global events like *IEEE Xtreme* and attend IEEE
   conferences. These are great opportunities to demonstrate your abilities
   and enhance your *professional profile*.
   5.

   *Resources to Stay Ahead*
   Gain access to the *IEEE Xplore* digital library and other exclusive
   IEEE resources, giving you an edge in coursework, research, and beyond.

------------------------------
Join One of Our Teams

As part of the IEEE Student Branch, you can also choose to join one of our
three specialized teams, based on your interests:

   - *Creative Media Team*: Get involved with content creation, graphic
   design, and social media, helping us promote our branch activities.
   - *Event Handling Team*: Plan, organize, and manage events like
   workshops and networking sessions, gaining valuable event management
   experience.
   - *Branch Representatives Team*: Act as a bridge between the branch and
   students, boosting engagement and awareness of our events.

If you do not want to be part of any of these 3 teams, but still want to be
part of *IEEE CSPIT SB* then you can always be a *Volunteer.*
Each of these teams offers you a great way to contribute, build skills, and
work closely with fellow students.
------------------------------
How to Join

Interested? It‚Äôs easy! Simply fill out the below google form and we will
call you for the selection process.

https://forms.gle/DMW9ZJh8hpv2eQG47

The Selection process consists of an interview round with the Executive
Committee of IEEE CSPIT SB and Faculty Advisor Harshul Yagnik Sir.

Once you fill out the google form you will be called for the interview
round and the allotments to specific teams will follow.

If you have any questions or want to learn more, feel free to reach out to
us at ieee.charusatsb@gmail.com or contact us on WhatsApp -

*Sakshi Shah [21CS064] - 9429866748*

Don‚Äôt miss this chance to boost your career and be part of a global network!


Looking Forward to have you onboard,
IEEE CSPIT SB 2024-25
[image: image.png]

subject: CSPIT 2024 State Quota (ACPC) Admission : MYSY Documents Submission / Verification
snippet: Dear CSPIT Students, We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission / verification start for the students admitted in the year 2024 under STATE QUOTA at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì UIIC office,
content:
Dear CSPIT Students,

We are pleased to inform you that MYSY documents submission / verification
start for the students admitted in the year 2024 *under STATE QUOTA
at CSPIT EE/EC Building ‚Äì UIIC office, Room No 102A.*

*For fresh students admitted in the year 2024 under Management Quota OR
Vacant Quota will be intimated soon.*

 *Please take a note of the following points before submitting
the documents:*

A.  Lock the Application and take printout of form. *P**rint out of
Application form from the WhatsApp image is not acceptable. *

B.  All uploaded scan documents *must be clearly visible**.*

C.  Submit the application form with photocopies of all uploaded
documents *(except
IT Form). *

D. Please upload a fee receipt which contains *Revenue Stamp and sign by
the Account Section of CHARUSAT. *

E. Students must write *Enrolment Number (ID No.) in the MYSY form. *

F. Upload Sahay renewal certificate *(Will get through your e governance
login) *from head of institute *in original with sign of Principal Sir (Not
blank). *

*G. **Write barcode ID at the top of the form* which will help us to
retrieve the data immediately.

*Special Note:*

1.      Students are requested to *just drop the application in the tray
placed at UIIC office.*

2.      To save time, *there is no need to stay at UIIC office, timely
appropriate action will be taken by us.*

3.      University shall remain closed from 25th October 2024 (Friday) to 5
th November 2024 (Tuesday) during the Diwali Festival.


      *REFER MYSY SITE FOR MORE INFO. (**http://mysy.guj.nic.in
<http://mysy.guj.nic.in/>**)*
--
Thanks,
*Yatin Talati*

Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa, Gujarat, INDIA 388421
www.charusat.ac.in

--

subject: Contest : Creative Name of CSPIT Newsletter
snippet: Dear CSPIT Student(s), Greetings!! We are pleased to announce the creative contest, "Name the CSPIT Newsletter" organized by the Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC), Chandubhai S. Patel
content:
*Dear CSPIT Student(s),*


Greetings!!



We are pleased to announce the creative contest, *"Name the CSPIT
Newsletter"* organized by the Internal Quality Assurance Cell (IQAC),
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology (CSPIT), CHARUSAT.



We are preparing to launch our very first newsletter in *December 2024*, to
be published *quarterly* every year. The CSPIT Newsletter will highlight
students‚Äô achievements, research, campus events, etc.



For this newsletter, we invite all current students to suggest a creative
name that perfectly captures the *spirit, innovation, and academic
excellence* *of CSPIT. *



*Salient features of the Contest:*


   1. The Contest is open from *September 23, 2024*, *12.01 AM* *to **September
   30, 2024, 11:59 PM**. *
   2. The best 3 names will be selected by the Scrutiny Committee. Winners
   will receive acknowledgement in the Inaugural newsletter, a certificate
   of appreciation and prize money.
   3. The Prize money for the First three entries will be distributed as
   follows:


   - 1st Prize ‚Äì Rs. 2,500
   - 2nd prize ‚Äì Rs. 1,500
   - 3rd prize ‚Äì Rs. 1,000

Participants can submit their submissions through the Registration QR Code. For
more information like registration, eligibility and submission guidelines,
important dates, selection process, intellectual property rights,  and

subject: ULSC logo competition!
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce the Digital Logo Making Competition for the students of CHARUSAT. This is a unique opportunity to showcase your creativity and design skills while contributing
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to announce the Digital Logo Making Competition for the
students of CHARUSAT. This is a unique opportunity to showcase your
creativity and design skills while contributing to an important aspect of
our student governance body.

*Competition Details:*
*Theme : *Design a logo that represents the values, vision, and mission of
the University level Central Students Council(ULSC).
*Eligibility : *Open to all students of CHARUSAT.
*Submission Format :* Logo designs must be created digitally and submitted
in .PNG or .JPEG format (high resolution).
*Submission Deadline : 22th September, 2024*

   - *VISION: - *To build an inclusive student community that fosters
   academic excellence, cultural enrichment, leadership, and holistic
   development.
   - *VALUES: - *We value inclusivity, collaboration, and excellence in all
   endeavors. Leadership, integrity, innovation, and student well-being are at
   the core of our actions.
   - MISSION: - Our mission is to provide opportunities for students to
   grow academically, culturally, and personally, promote teamwork and
   leadership, and advocate for student needs to create a supportive
   university environment.

*Google Form: *https://forms.gle/VEQhCobuiNDhT7ri8
Submit your entries here

Further details have been shared in the document attached below.

We look forward to seeing your creative submissions!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

subject: PPT format for the Shark Tank Students' Competition 2024.
snippet: Dear Students, An event titled "The Shark Tank Students' Competition 2024" is organized by MS Patel Department of Civil Engineering, inspired by the popular TV show Shark Tank. The event
content:
Dear Students,

An event titled* "The Shark Tank Students' Competition 2024"* is organized
by M. S. Patel Department of Civil Engineering, *inspired by the popular TV
show Shark Tank*. The event is scheduled for September 21, 2024. The event
is open to all year students enrolled in the CSPIT.

The event allows students to showcase their start-up plans in front of a
panel of judges/jury members (drawn from the faculty members of IIIM,
CHARUSAT). The event aims to foster an entrepreneurial spirit among the
students, amplify their business strategies and learn what it takes to
launch a successful company. A detailed brochure of this event is attached
herewith.

This competition has two rounds. In the first round, after completion of
your registration, you have to prepare your PPT as per the format attached
below and submit it before September 19, 2024. In the final round, selected
groups have to present their business plan in front of the jury
on September 21, 2024.

For any further querries you can contact me.


Thanks & Regards

Ms. Hemangi Oza
M. Tech Environment Engineer
Assistant Professor
Dept. of Civil Engineering
CSPIT CHARUSAT
Changa, Anand.
Mo. No.: 8780473646

--
