subject: AICTE -approved industrial internship for students [cisco & meta certification]
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce an AICTE-approved internship program in collaboration with TNK Cognizance IIT Roorkee. If you're interested, fill out the application below: https://docs.
content:
Dear  Students,

We are excited to announce an *AICTE-approved internship program* in
collaboration with *TNK Cognizance IIT Roorkee*.

If you're interested,  fill out the application below:
*https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScaz1QYoNayJsy4_mks4K9C6M9GSrEM_2STii2pTLvvd2Qjbw/viewform?usp=sf_link*
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScaz1QYoNayJsy4_mks4K9C6M9GSrEM_2STii2pTLvvd2Qjbw/viewform?usp=sf_link>

*About the Program:*
This program provides a *2-month Training + Internship* program, and we
accept a particular* number of students*.

To learn more, join the *WhatsApp group*:
 *https://chat.whatsapp.com/H7cpqMAOakX5TmiwPffBHs*
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/H7cpqMAOakX5TmiwPffBHs>

*Program Overview:*

   - *First Month:* Live lectures delivered by *IIT faculty* and *industry
   professionals*. You will receive login credentials after registration.
   - *Second Month:* Internship with live project mentorship. Gain
   experience solving *real-world problems*.

*Projects:*

   - *Individual Projects:* Each intern will be assigned *10 projects* to
   complete with mentor guidance.
   - *Capstone Project:* A collaborative group project where each intern is
   responsible for specific tasks.

necessary *resources* and *materials* will be provided.

*Learning Options:*

   1. *Blended Program (Recorded Classes):* entrance to recorded sessions
   with weekend *live doubt-clearing sessions*.
   2. *Mentor-Led Program (Live Classes):* *Live classes* via Zoom, *2-3
   days a week* at *6:30 PM*, with visibility to recordings and a *Learning
   Management System (LMS)* for 6 months.

*Upon Completion, You Will Receive:*

   - *Certificate of completion* from Cognizance IIT Roorkee.
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - *Co-branded internship certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *Placement support*.
   - Entry to our *growing professional community*.
   - Hands-on experience with *low-code and no-code tools*.
   - Expertise in *Generative AI* and *Prompt Engineering*.
   - *Exclusive Masterclasses* from industry leaders.
   - *Personalized guidance* throughout the program.

We would like to encourage you to take advantage of this unique program.

subject: Tips for using your new inbox
snippet: Welcome to your inbox Find emails fast With the power of Google Search in your inbox, you can archive all your email and find it later in a flash. Your inbox stays tidy, and you never need to worry
content:
Tips for using your new inbox
[image: Gmail]

Welcome to your inbox
[image: Search]
Find emails fast
With the power of Google Search in your inbox, you can archive
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6576?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all your email and find it
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6593?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
later in a flash. Your inbox stays tidy, and you never need to worry about
what to keep.
[image: Personalize]
Personalize Mail Server for Student of CHARUSAT Mail
Customize inbox backgrounds, email signatures, and other options in Mail
Server for Student of CHARUSAT Mail settings
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6562?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>.
Review and adjust your privacy and security settings at My Account
<https://myaccount.google.com/>.
[image: Organize]
Organize your email
You can organize email with labels
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/118708?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>,
which are like folders, but you can add more than one label to a message.
You can also use filters
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6579?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
to automatically sort and categorize messages as they come in.
[image: Social]
Chat and meet directly from your inbox
Message with contacts in Google Chat
<https://support.google.com/chat/answer/9341104?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
and start video meetings with up to 100 people in Google Meet
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/9822902?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all without leaving Gmail.

Get training and tips
Find Gmail guides, tips, cheat sheets, help switching from Microsoft¬Æ
Outlook¬Æ, and more at the Google Workspace Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
.
Visit the Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>

Happy emailing,
The Gmail Team
[image: Google Cloud]
